name: Relicanth
desc: Relicanth is a Water/Rock type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Longevity Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 179 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)042 (X/Y — Coastal Kalos)188 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)262 (Sun/Moon — Alola dex)343 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)187 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: RELICANTH is a POKéMON species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient POKéMON feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: RELICANTH is a rare species that was discovered in deep-sea explorations. This POKéMON’s body withstands the enormous water pressure of the ocean depths. Its body is covered in tough scales that are like craggy rocks.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A POKéMON that was once believed to have been extinct. The species has not changed its form for 100 million years. It walks on the seafloor using its pectoral fins.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: Discovered by chance during deep-sea explorations, it has not changed since ancient times.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
pokedex_entries.X: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
pokedex_entries.Y: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Relicanth is a Pokémon species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient Pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Relicanth is a rare species that was discovered in deep-sea explorations. This Pokémon’s body withstands the enormous water pressure of the ocean depths. Its body is covered in tough scales that are like craggy rocks.
pokedex_entries.Sun: Its form has remained the same for one hundred million years. Its body is filled with fat, so it can withstand the water pressure of the deep sea.
pokedex_entries.Moon: It was fortuitously discovered during a deep sea expedition. Its teeth have atrophied, so it now survives on microscopic organisms it sucks up.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Thought to have gone extinct, Relicanth was given a name that is a variation of the name of the person who discovered it.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: The reason it hasn’t changed at all in a hundred million years is that it’s apparently already a perfect life-form.
pokedex_entries.Sword: Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bladders allow this Pokémon to survive the intense water pressure of the deep sea.
pokedex_entries.Shield: This Pokémon was discovered during deep-sea exploration. Its appearance hasn’t changed in 100,000,000 years, so it’s called a living fossil.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: This rare Pokémon was discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

location.Ultra SunUltra Moon: Ancient Poni Path, Poni Breaker Coast

name: Gorebyss
desc: Gorebyss is a Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the South Sea Pokémon.

name_origin.gore: to pierce with a horn or tusk

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 178 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)143 (X/Y — Coastal Kalos)187 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)142 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: GOREBYSS lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this POKéMON’s body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: Although GOREBYSS is the very picture of elegance and beauty while swimming, it is also cruel. When it spots prey, this POKéMON inserts its thin mouth into the prey’s body and drains the prey of its body fluids.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A GOREBYSS siphons the body fluids of prey through its thin, tubular mouth. Its light pink body color turns vivid when it finishes feeding.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: Its pink body becomes more vivid with the rise of water temperatures in the springtime.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
pokedex_entries.X: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
pokedex_entries.Y: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Gorebyss lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this Pokémon’s body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Although Gorebyss is the very picture of elegance and beauty while swimming, it is also cruel. When it spots prey, this Pokémon inserts its thin mouth into the prey’s body and drains the prey of its body fluids.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: The color of its body changes with the water temperature. The coloration of Gorebyss in Alola is almost blindingly vivid.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it becomes food for other Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.

name: Huntail
desc: Huntail is a Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Deep Sea Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 177 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)142 (X/Y — Coastal Kalos)186 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)141 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: HUNTAIL’s presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This POKéMON’s eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: HUNTAIL’s tail is shaped like a fish. It uses the tail to attract prey, then swallows the prey whole with its large, gaping mouth. This POKéMON swims by wiggling its slender body like a snake.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: To withstand the crushing pressure of water deep under the sea, its spine is very thick and sturdy. Its tail, which is shaped like a small fish, has eyes that light up.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It lives deep in the pitch-dark sea. It attracts prey by moving its tail in mimicry of a small animal.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
pokedex_entries.X: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.
pokedex_entries.Y: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Huntail’s presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This Pokémon’s eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Huntail’s tail is shaped like a fish. It uses the tail to attract prey, then swallows the prey whole with its large, gaping mouth. This Pokémon swims by wiggling its slender body like a snake.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: It’s not the strongest swimmer. It wags its tail to lure in its prey and then gulps them down as soon as they get close.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Deep seas are their habitat. According to tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore, something unfortunate will happen.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.

name: Clamperl
desc: Clamperl is a Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Bivalve Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 176 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)141 (X/Y — Coastal Kalos)185 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)140 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: CLAMPERL grows while being protected by its rock-hard shell. When its body becomes too large to fit inside the shell, it is sure evidence that this POKéMON is getting close to evolution.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A CLAMPERL slams its shell closed on prey to prevent escape. The pearl it creates upon evolution is said to be infused with a mysterious energy.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it’s held.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
pokedex_entries.X: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it’s held.
pokedex_entries.Y: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Clamperl’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection—it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown Clamperl’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Clamperl grows while being protected by its rock-hard shell. When its body becomes too large to fit inside the shell, it is sure evidence that this Pokémon is getting close to evolution.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Despite its appearance, it’s carnivorous. It clamps down on its prey with both sides of its shell and doesn’t let go until they stop moving.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly precious. They can be more than 10 times as costly as Shellder’s pearls.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.

location.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Route 219, 221, Fountainspring Cave, Riverbank Cave, Still-Water Cavern

name: Walrein
desc: Walrein is an Ice/Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Ice Break Pokémon.

name_origin.reign: to rule over others, like royalty

pokedex_entries.Ruby: WALREIN’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This POKéMON’s thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: WALREIN swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. It is protected by its thick blubber.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: To protect its herd, the leader battles anything that invades its territory, even at the cost of its life. Its tusks may snap off in battle.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: Not only does its thick blubber keep it warm, it also protects it from attacks. It shatters ice with its prized tusks.
pokedex_entries.X: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.Y: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Walrein’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing 10 tons with one blow. This Pokémon’s thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.
pokedex_entries.Sword: Walrein form herds of 20 to 30 individuals. When a threat appears, the herd’s leader will protect the group with its life.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Walrein’s tusks keep growing throughout its life. Tusks broken in battle will grow back to their usual impressive size in a year.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Its thick tusks are strong enough to shatter drift ice. They have been known to break, but they will grow back by the next year. The Hisui region is well known for these broken tusks.

location.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Whiteout Cave, Icy Cave, Glacial Cavern

name: Sealeo
desc: Sealeo is an Ice/Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Ball Roll Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: SEALEO has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This POKéMON occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL on its nose.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: SEALEO often balances and rolls things on the tip of its nose. While the POKéMON is rolling something, it checks the object’s aroma and texture to determine whether it likes the object or not.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It touches new things with its nose to test for smell and feel. It plays by spinning SPHEAL on its nose.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: SEALEO live in herds on ice floes. Using its powerful flippers, it shatters ice. It dives into the sea to hunt prey five times a day.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: Be it Spheal or Poké Ball, it will spin any round object on its nose with the greatest of ease.
pokedex_entries.X: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
pokedex_entries.Y: Be it Spheal or Poké Ball, it will spin any round object on its nose with the greatest of ease.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Sealeo has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This Pokémon occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a Spheal on its nose.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Sealeo often balances and rolls things on the tip of its nose. While the Pokémon is rolling something, it checks the object’s aroma and texture to determine whether it likes the object or not.
pokedex_entries.Sword: Sealeo live on top of drift ice. They go swimming when they’re on the hunt, seeking out their prey by scent.
pokedex_entries.Shield: This Pokémon has a habit of spinning round things on its nose, whether those things are Poké Balls or Spheal.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Its white whiskers are very sensitive. Sealeo will balance Spheal on the tip of its nose, checking its scent and its feel to be sure the Spheal is healthy.

location.Shining Pearl: Route 226, 230, Whiteout Cave, Icy Cave, Glacial Cavern

name: Spheal
desc: Spheal is an Ice/Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Clap Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: SPHEAL is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this POKéMON eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: SPHEAL always travels by rolling around on its ball-like body. When the season for ice floes arrives, this POKéMON can be seen rolling about on ice and crossing the sea.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It is completely covered with plushy fur. As a result, it never feels the cold even when it is rolling about on ice floes or diving in the sea.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It crosses the oceans by rolling itself on drifting ice. Fluffy fur keeps it warm when the temperature is below freezing.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: They can’t swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When they’re happy, they clap fins.
pokedex_entries.X: They can’t swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When they’re happy, they clap fins.
pokedex_entries.Y: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Spheal is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this Pokémon eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Spheal always travels by rolling around on its ball-like body. When the season for ice floes arrives, this Pokémon can be seen rolling about on ice and crossing the sea.
pokedex_entries.Sword: This Pokémon’s body is covered in blubber and impressively round. It’s faster for Spheal to roll around than walk.
pokedex_entries.Shield: As it drifts among the waves, Spheal probes the sea. As soon as it spots prey, it informs the Walrein in its herd.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: During the season when drift ice approaches the shore, Spheal prefers living on the ice—where fewer predators lurk—rather than the land. Its fur retains heat superbly and resists harsh cold.

location.Shining Pearl: Route 226, 230, Whiteout Cave, Icy Cave, Glacial Cavern

name: Glalie
desc: Glalie is an Ice type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Face Pokémon.

name_origin.goalie: a goalkeeper; Glalie’s design is based on an ice hockey goalie

name: Snorunt
desc: Snorunt is an Ice type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Snow Hat Pokémon.

name_origin.runt: the smallest of a litter of animals

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 171 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)206 (Platinum)179 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)246 (Sun/Moon — Alola dex)323 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)079 (Sword/Shield)205 (Legends: Arceus)025 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: SNORUNT live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: SNORUNT survives by eating only snow and ice. Old folklore claims that a house visited by this POKéMON is sure to prosper for many generations to come.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It is said that a home visited by a SNORUNT will prosper. It can withstand cold of minus 150 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: They tend to move about in groups of around five SNORUNT. In snowy regions, it is said that when they are seen late at night, snowfall will arrive by morning.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearl: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a SNORUNT lives there.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It is said that several SNORUNT gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It’s said that if they are seen at midnight, they’ll cause heavy snow. They eat snow and ice to survive.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
pokedex_entries.X: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
pokedex_entries.Y: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a Snorunt lives there.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Snorunt live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this Pokémon steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Snorunt survives by eating only snow and ice. Old folklore claims that a house visited by this Pokémon is sure to prosper for many generations to come.
pokedex_entries.Sun: Their numbers seem to have rapidly increased in Alola. Custom has it that houses where Snorunt live will be prosperous for generations to come.
pokedex_entries.Moon: It can only survive in cold areas. It bounces happily around, even in environments as cold as -150 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: It feeds mainly on ice and snow. It’s only able to survive in a limited number of places in the warm Alola region.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Rich people from cold areas all share childhood memories of playing with Snorunt.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It’s said that if they are seen at midnight, they’ll cause heavy snow. They eat snow and ice to survive.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It can only survive in cold areas. It bounces happily around, even in environments as cold as −150 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: In some snowy lands, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a Snorunt lives there.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Arrives alongside the first snow. It’s thought that homes Snorunt visit will prosper for many generations. By tradition, one might offer a lump of ice made from pure water at one’s front door.

name: Wynaut
desc: Wynaut is a Psychic type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Bright Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: WYNAUT can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this POKéMON will be slapping the ground with its tail.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: WYNAUT gather on moonlit nights to play by squeezing up against each other. By being squeezed, this POKéMON gains endurance and is trained to dole out powerful counterattacks.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A WYNAUT loves to eat sweet fruits. It cleverly picks fruits using its earlike arms. They gather in fruit gardens, drawn by the fragrance.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
pokedex_entries.X: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
pokedex_entries.Y: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Wynaut can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this Pokémon will be slapping the ground with its tail.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Wynaut gather on moonlit nights to play by squeezing up against each other. By being squeezed, this Pokémon gains endurance and is trained to dole out powerful counterattacks.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: They grow strong by pushing up against one another en masse. They love eating sweet fruit.

name: Absol
desc: Absol is a Dark type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Disaster Pokémon.

name: Chimecho
desc: Chimecho is a Psychic type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Wind Chime Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 151 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)083 (Diamond/Pearl)083 (Platinum)112 (X/Y — Coastal Kalos)158 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)083 (Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl)196 (Legends: Arceus)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: CHIMECHO makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this POKéMON becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: In high winds, CHIMECHO cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This POKéMON plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It travels by riding on winds. It cleverly uses its long tail to pluck nuts and berries, which it loves to eat.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: They fly about very actively when the hot season arrives. They communicate among themselves using seven different and distinguishing cries.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: To knock foes flying, it makes the air shudder with its cries. It converses using seven cries.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travel great distances.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a tree or from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.
pokedex_entries.X: It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a tree or from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.
pokedex_entries.Y: Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travel great distances.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this Pokémon becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This Pokémon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: To knock foes flying, it makes the air shudder with its cries. It converses using seven cries.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: Chimecho emits ultrasonic cries. It floats on the wind to travel great distances.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Can emit waves of air powerful enough to knock out prey taller than itself. I hypothesize that it amplifies the faint sound of wind within its body.

name: Tropius
desc: Tropius is a Grass/Flying type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Fruit Pokémon.

name_origin.tropical: of or relating to the rainforest

pokedex_entries.Ruby: The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS’s neck are very popular with children. This POKéMON loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: Children of the southern tropics eat as snacks the fruit that grows in bunches around the neck of TROPIUS. This POKéMON flies by flapping the leaves on its back as if they were wings.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It flies by flapping its broad leaves. The bunch of fruit that grows around its neck is deliciously sweet. In the spring, it scatters pollen from its neck.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearl: Because it continually ate only its favorite fruit, the fruit started growing around its neck.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: The bunch of fruit around its neck ripens twice a year and is delicious. It’s a highly favored tropical snack.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.
pokedex_entries.X: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.
pokedex_entries.Y: The bunch of fruit around its neck ripens twice a year and is delicious. It’s a highly favored tropical snack.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: The bunches of fruit around Tropius’s neck are very popular with children. This Pokémon loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Children of the southern tropics eat as snacks the fruit that grows in bunches around the neck of Tropius. This Pokémon flies by flapping the leaves on its back as if they were wings.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: The bunches of fruit growing around the necks of Tropius in Alola are especially sweet compared to those in other regions.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Bunches of delicious fruit grow around its neck. In warm areas, many ranches raise Tropius.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Because it continually ate only its favorite fruit, the fruit started growing around its neck.

location.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Grassland Cave, Swampy Cave, Sunlit Cavern, Bogsunk Cavern

name: Dusclops
desc: Dusclops is a Ghost type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Beckon Pokémon.

name_origin.dusk: the partial darkness between day and night

pokedex_entries.Ruby: DUSCLOPS’s body is completely hollow - there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This POKéMON will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: DUSCLOPS absorbs anything, however large the object may be. This POKéMON hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in a macabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear. The hypnotized foe is made to do DUSCLOPS’s bidding.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It is thought that its body is hollow with only a spectral ball of fire burning inside. However, no one has been able to confirm this theory as fact.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearl: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
pokedex_entries.X: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
pokedex_entries.Y: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Dusclops’s body is completely hollow—there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This Pokémon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Dusclops absorbs anything, however large the object may be. This Pokémon hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in a macabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear. The hypnotized foe is made to do Dusclops’s bidding.
pokedex_entries.Sword: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: There are rumors that peeking inside its bandage-wrapped body will cause one to get pulled in through the gaps between the bandages, never to return. I’ve been too scared to verify.

location.Legends: Arceus: Arena's Approach, Avalanche Slopes, Deadwood Haunt

name: Duskull
desc: Duskull is a Ghost type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Requiem Pokémon.

name_origin.dusk: the partial darkness between day and night
name_origin.skull: the bony framework of the head

pokedex_entries.Ruby: DUSKULL can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this POKéMON chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: DUSKULL wanders lost among the deep darkness of midnight. There is an oft-told admonishment given to misbehaving children that this POKéMON will spirit away bad children who earn scoldings from their mothers.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A glare from its single scarlet eye makes even burly grown-ups freeze in utter fear. It is a nocturnal POKéMON that roams about under the cloak of darkness.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearl: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It loves the crying of children. It startles bad kids by passing through walls and making them cry.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away--or so it’s said.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It loves the crying of children. It startles bad kids by passing through walls and making them cry.
pokedex_entries.X: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
pokedex_entries.Y: If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away--or so it’s said.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Duskull can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this Pokémon chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Duskull wanders lost among the deep darkness of midnight. There is an oft-told admonishment given to misbehaving children that this Pokémon will spirit away bad children who earn scoldings from their mothers.
pokedex_entries.Sword: If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away—or so it’s said.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever the prey goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: I’ve heard that the children of Hisui all begin to behave once they’ve been told the story of how this Pokémon roams about before the witching hour to spirit away misbehaving children.

name: Shuppet
desc: Shuppet is a Ghost type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Puppet Pokémon.

name_origin.shadow: dark area created by blocking out light
name_origin.puppet: referring to ‘shadow puppet’, casting shadow shapes with one’s hands

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 146 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)210 (Black 2/White 2)122 (X/Y — Mountain Kalos)151 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)316 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: SHUPPET is attracted by feelings of jealousy and vindictiveness. If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this POKéMON will appear in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves of that person’s home.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: SHUPPET grows by feeding on dark emotions, such as vengefulness and envy, in the hearts of people. It roams through cities in search of grudges that taint people.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: This POKéMON roams about deep in the night seeking such negative emotions as grudges and envy. It retreats to its nest when the sun begins to rise.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It uses its horn to feed on envy and malice, or so it’s said. It’s very active at night.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: It feeds on the dark emotions of sadness and hatred, which make it grow steadily stronger.
pokedex_entries.X: It uses its horn to feed on envy and malice--or so it’s said. It’s very active at night.
pokedex_entries.Y: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Shuppet is attracted by feelings of jealousy and vindictiveness. If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this Pokémon will appear in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves of that person’s home.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Shuppet grows by feeding on dark emotions, such as vengefulness and envy, in the hearts of people. It roams through cities in search of grudges that taint people.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: It eats up emotions like malice, jealousy, and resentment, so some people are grateful for its presence.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: There’s a proverb that says, “Shun the house where Shuppet gather in the growing dusk.”
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: They love vengeful emotions and hang in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.

name: Kecleon
desc: Kecleon is a Normal type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Color Swap Pokémon.

name_origin.kakureru: from its Japanese name meaning ‘to hide’
name_origin.chameleon: lizard known for its ability to adapt to its surroundings

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 145 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)116 (X/Y — Central Kalos)150 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)214 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: KECLEON is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception - this POKéMON can’t change the zigzag pattern on its belly.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: KECLEON alters its body coloration to blend in with its surroundings, allowing it to sneak up on its prey unnoticed. Then it lashes out with its long, stretchy tongue to instantly ensnare the unsuspecting target.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It changes body color to blend in with its surroundings. It also changes color if it is happy or sad.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A POKéMON that has the ability to alter its body colors to match its surroundings. A KECLEON reverts to its original colors if it is startled.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.
pokedex_entries.X: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.
pokedex_entries.Y: It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Kecleon is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception—this Pokémon can’t change the zigzag pattern on its belly.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Kecleon alters its body coloration to blend in with its surroundings, allowing it to sneak up on its prey unnoticed. Then it lashes out with its long, stretchy tongue to instantly ensnare the unsuspecting target.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: It changes its hue to blend into its surroundings. If no one takes notice of it for too long, it will pout and never reveal itself.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Its color changes for concealment and also when its mood or health changes. The darker the color, the healthier it is.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.

desc: Castform is a Normal type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Weather Pokémon.

name_origin.form: state or shape (referring to Castform’s ability)

name: Milotic
desc: Milotic is a Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Tender Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 141 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)139 (Diamond/Pearl)139 (Platinum)146 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)156 (Sun/Moon — Alola dex)190 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)153 (Sword/Shield)139 (Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl)189 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: MILOTIC is said to be the most beautiful of all the POKéMON. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: MILOTIC live at the bottom of large lakes. When this POKéMON’s body glows a vivid pink, it releases a pulsing wave of energy that brings soothing calm to restless spirits.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: MILOTIC is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It is said to live at the bottom of large lakes. Considered to be the most beautiful of all POKéMON, it has been depicted in paintings and statues.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: It is the world’s most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring MILOTIC.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It’s said that a glimpse of a MILOTIC and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.
pokedex_entries.X: Milotic is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
pokedex_entries.Y: It is the world’s most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring Milotic.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Milotic is said to be the most beautiful of all the Pokémon. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Milotic live at the bottom of large lakes. When this Pokémon’s body glows a vivid pink, it releases a pulsing wave of energy that brings soothing calm to troubled hearts.
pokedex_entries.Sun: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.
pokedex_entries.Moon: It lives at the bottom of clear lakes. In times of war, it shows itself, which soothes people’s minds and hearts.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: While Milotic is said to be the most beautiful Pokémon, Trainers who like Feebas and have raised it are seemingly disappointed by Milotic.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Its dwelling place is the bottom of big lakes. Those who behold its loveliness are said to have their hearts purified.
pokedex_entries.Sword: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: It is the world’s most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring Milotic.

name: Feebas
desc: Feebas is a Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Fish Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 140 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)138 (Diamond/Pearl)138 (Platinum)145 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)155 (Sun/Moon — Alola dex)189 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)152 (Sword/Shield)138 (Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl)188 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: FEEBAS’s fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this POKéMON is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: While FEEBAS’s body is in tatters, it has a hardy and tenacious life force that enables it to live anywhere. However, this POKéMON is also slow and dimwitted, making it an easy catch.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: Ridiculed for its shabby appearance, it is ignored by researchers. It lives in ponds choked with weeds.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: FEEBAS live in ponds that are heavily infested with weeds. Because of its hopelessly shabby appearance, it seems as if few TRAINERS raise it.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: It is famous for its shabby appearance. While populous, they tend to cluster in set locations.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It is the shabbiest Pokémon of all. It forms in schools and lives at the bottom of rivers.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
pokedex_entries.X: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.
pokedex_entries.Y: It is the shabbiest Pokémon of all. It forms in schools and lives at the bottom of rivers.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Feebas’s fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this Pokémon is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: While Feebas’s body is in tatters, it has a hardy and tenacious life force that enables it to live anywhere. However, this Pokémon is also slow and dimwitted, making it an easy catch.
pokedex_entries.Sun: A tough Pokémon that is perfectly fine even in dirty water. However, due to its ragged, shabby appearance, it isn’t popular.
pokedex_entries.Moon: Although unattractive and unpopular, this Pokémon’s marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: They look ragged, so no one catches them. They look like they’d taste bad, so predators won’t eat them. And their numbers continue to grow.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Because of its wretched appearance, most people pay it no attention, but there are some who collect Feebas—and Feebas alone!
pokedex_entries.Sword: Although unattractive and unpopular, this Pokémon’s marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: They are famous for their shabby appearance. Although populous, they tend to cluster in set locations.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.

name: Armaldo
desc: Armaldo is a Rock/Bug type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Plate Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 136 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)141 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)234 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)186 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: ARMALDO’s tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This POKéMON’s two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: ARMALDO is a POKéMON species that became extinct in prehistoric times. This POKéMON is said to have walked on its hind legs, which would have been more convenient for life on land.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: ARMALDO usually lives on land. However, when it hunts for prey, it dives beneath the ocean. It swims around using its two large wings.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.
pokedex_entries.X: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.
pokedex_entries.Y: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Armaldo’s tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This Pokémon’s two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Armaldo is a Pokémon species that became extinct in prehistoric times. This Pokémon is said to have walked on its hind legs, which would have been more convenient for life on land.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: It lived on land and went out into the sea to hunt for prey. Its sharp claws were its greatest weapon.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Armaldo adapted from living in water to living on land. It has been determined that it is the ancestor of some bug Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.Sword: After evolution, this Pokémon emerged onto land. Its lower body has become stronger, and blows from its tail are devastating.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Though it lives on land, it’s also a good swimmer. It dives into the ocean in search of prey, using its sharp claws to take down its quarry.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.

name: Anorith
desc: Anorith is a Rock/Bug type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Old Shrimp Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 135 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)140 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)233 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)185 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: ANORITH was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive POKéMON once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: ANORITH is said to be a type of POKéMON predecessor, with eight wings at the sides of its body. This POKéMON swam in the primordial sea by undulating these eight wings.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It is a kind of POKéMON progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It was resurrected from a fossil using the power of science. It swims by undulating the eight wings at its sides. They were feet that adapted to life in the sea.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: An ancestral Pokémon that lived in the ocean. Over time, its eight feet transformed into wings.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
pokedex_entries.X: It is a kind of Pokémon progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.
pokedex_entries.Y: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Anorith was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive Pokémon once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Anorith is said to be a type of Pokémon predecessor, with eight wings at the sides of its body. This Pokémon swam in the primordial sea by undulating these eight wings.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: When restored Anorith are released into the ocean, they don’t thrive, because the water composition has changed since their era.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: This is one kind of primeval bug Pokémon. With eight wings, it could apparently swim a lot faster than you’d expect.
pokedex_entries.Sword: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. Anorith lived in the ocean about 100,000,000 years ago, hunting with its pair of claws.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Anorith can swim swiftly by pulling its eight wings through the water like oars on a boat. This Pokémon is an ancestor of modern bug Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: This Pokémon ancestor was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with its claws.

name: Cradily
desc: Cradily is a Rock/Grass type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Barnacle Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 134 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)139 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)232 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)184 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: CRADILY roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This POKéMON freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: CRADILY’s body serves as an anchor, preventing it from being washed away in rough seas. This POKéMON secretes a strong digestive fluid from its tentacles.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It drags its heavy body along the seafloor. It makes its nest in the shallows of warm seas. CRADILY can be seen on beaches when the tide goes out.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It lives in warm seas. Its heavy body weighs it down so it won’t get washed away in rough weather.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
pokedex_entries.X: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
pokedex_entries.Y: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Cradily roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This Pokémon freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Cradily’s body serves as an anchor, preventing it from being washed away in rough seas. This Pokémon secretes a strong digestive fluid from its tentacles.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Normally, it lived on shallow sea shoals. When the tide went out, this Pokémon came up on land to search for prey.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: This carnivorous Pokémon lived in primordial seas. It catches prey in its eight tentacles and dissolves them with digestive fluid as it eats.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It has short legs and can’t walk very fast, but its neck and tentacles can extend to over three times their usual length to nab distant prey.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Once Cradily catches prey in its tentacles, it digests them whole and absorbs their nutrients.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.

name: Lileep
desc: Lileep is a Rock/Grass type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Sea Lily Pokémon.

name_origin.creeper: plant or root that grows underground

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 133 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)138 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)231 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)183 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: LILEEP became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient POKéMON attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles shaped like flower petals.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: LILEEP is an ancient POKéMON that was regenerated from a fossil. It remains permanently anchored to a rock. From its immobile perch, this POKéMON intently scans for prey with its two eyes.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It became extinct roughly 100 million years ago. It was regenerated from a fossil using advanced techniques.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It disguises itself as seaweed by making its tentacles sway. Unsuspecting prey that come too close are swallowed whole. It became extinct 100 million years ago.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
pokedex_entries.X: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.
pokedex_entries.Y: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Lileep became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient Pokémon attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles shaped like flower petals.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Lileep is an ancient Pokémon that was regenerated from a fossil. It remains permanently anchored to a rock. From its immobile perch, this Pokémon intently scans for prey with its two eyes.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: In ancient times, it lived in warm seas. It disguised itself as seaweed to ambush its prey and devoured them whole when they got close.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: It sticks to rocks with its powerful suckers and can’t be washed away no matter how rough the surf gets.
pokedex_entries.Sword: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. Lileep once lived in warm seas that existed approximately 100,000,000 years ago.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Lileep clings to rocks on the seabed. When prey comes close, this Pokémon entangles it with petallike tentacles.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.

name: Claydol
desc: Claydol is a Ground/Psychic type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Clay Doll Pokémon.

name_origin.clay: hard substance used for crockery and decorations

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 132 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)170 (Black 2/White 2)137 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)311 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)083 (Sword/Shield)152 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: CLAYDOL are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This POKéMON moves about while levitating.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: CLAYDOL is an enigma that appeared from a clay statue made by an ancient civilization dating back 20,000 years. This POKéMON shoots beams from both its hands.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A CLAYDOL sleeps while hovering in midair. Its arms are separate from its body. They are kept floating by the POKéMON’s manipulation of psychic power.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It is said that it originates from clay dolls made by an ancient civilization.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.
pokedex_entries.X: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
pokedex_entries.Y: It is said that it originates from clay dolls made by an ancient civilization.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Claydol are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This Pokémon moves about while levitating.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Claydol is an enigma that appeared from a clay statue made by an ancient civilization dating back 20,000 years. This Pokémon shoots beams from both its hands.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: If it gets wet, its body melts. When rain starts to fall, it wraps its whole body up with its psychic powers to protect itself.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: The ancient people who made it apparently modeled it after something that descended from the sky. It fires beams from both arms.
pokedex_entries.Sword: This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: An ancient clay figurine was exposed to a mysterious ray of light, and it came to life as a Pokémon.

name: Baltoy
desc: Baltoy is a Ground/Psychic type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Clay Doll Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 131 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)169 (Black 2/White 2)136 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)310 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)082 (Sword/Shield)151 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: BALTOY moves while spinning around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this POKéMON living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: As soon as it spots others of its kind, BALTOY congregates with them and then begins crying noisily in unison. This POKéMON sleeps while cleverly balancing itself on its one foot.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A BALTOY moves by spinning on its single foot. It has been depicted in murals adorning the walls of a once-bustling city in an ancient age.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some BALTOY have been seen spinning on their heads.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: Discovered in ancient ruins, it moves by spinning around and forms a group when it finds others.
pokedex_entries.X: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
pokedex_entries.Y: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Baltoy moves while spinning around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this Pokémon living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: As soon as it spots others of its kind, Baltoy congregates with them and then begins crying noisily in unison. This Pokémon sleeps while cleverly balancing itself on its one foot.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Depictions of Pokémon similar to Baltoy have been found on the walls of caves where primitive humans lived.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: When they find others of their kind, they cry out loudly and gather together. Large numbers of them can be found in old graveyards.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.

name: Crawdaunt
desc: Crawdaunt is a Water/Dark type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Rogue Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 130 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)280 (Black 2/White 2)052 (X/Y — Central Kalos)135 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)358 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)103 (Sword/Shield)092 (The Isle of Armor)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this POKéMON, making them desolate places.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: CRAWDAUNT molts (sheds) its shell regularly. Immediately after molting, its shell is soft and tender. Until the shell hardens, this POKéMON hides in its streambed burrow to avoid attack from its foes.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A brutish POKéMON that loves to battle. A veteran CRAWDAUNT that has prevailed in hundreds of battles has giant pincers marked with countless scars.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: Loving to battle, this Pokémon pinches all Pokémon that enter its territory with its pincers and throws them out.
pokedex_entries.X: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
pokedex_entries.Y: Loving to battle, this Pokémon pinches all Pokémon that enter its territory with its pincers and throws them out.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Crawdaunt has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this Pokémon, making them desolate places.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Crawdaunt molts (sheds) its shell regularly. Immediately after molting, its shell is soft and tender. Until the shell hardens, this Pokémon hides in its streambed burrow to avoid attack from its foes.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Its temperament is rough and it loves to fight, but as soon as its pincers break off, it turns cowardly. It stays timid until they grow back.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Its pincers often fall off. Unlike with Crabrawler or Clauncher, the meat in its claws is utterly nasty and stinking.
pokedex_entries.Sword: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.
pokedex_entries.Shield: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.

name: Corphish
desc: Corphish is a Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Ruffian Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 129 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)279 (Black 2/White 2)051 (X/Y — Central Kalos)134 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)357 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)102 (Sword/Shield)091 (The Isle of Armor)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: CORPHISH were originally foreign POKéMON that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This POKéMON is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: CORPHISH catches prey with its sharp claws. It has no likes or dislikes when it comes to food - it will eat anything. This POKéMON has no trouble living in filthy water.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It came from overseas. It is a very hardy creature that will quickly proliferate, even in polluted streams.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Once it grips prey with its large pincers, it will never let go, no matter what. It is a hardy POKéMON that can thrive in any environment.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
pokedex_entries.X: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
pokedex_entries.Y: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Corphish were originally foreign Pokémon that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This Pokémon is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Corphish catches prey with its sharp claws. It has no likes or dislikes when it comes to food—it will eat anything. This Pokémon has no trouble living in filthy water.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Individuals that have been set free by Trainers who could no longer raise them have become common, and they can now be found in Alola.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: It can adapt very well to its environment. Feebas and Corphish are about the only Pokémon to live in stagnant ditches.
pokedex_entries.Sword: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.

name: Whiscash
desc: Whiscash is a Water/Ground type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Whiskers Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 128 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)081 (Diamond/Pearl)081 (Platinum)041 (X/Y — Mountain Kalos)133 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)094 (Sun/Moon — Alola dex)114 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)229 (Sword/Shield)081 (Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl)098 (Legends: Arceus)138 (The Isle of Armor)061 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: WHISCASH is extremely territorial. Just one of these POKéMON will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: If WHISCASH goes on a wild rampage, it sets off a quake-like tremor with a radius of over three miles. This POKéMON has the ability to predict real earthquakes.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything - if it is alive, WHISCASH will eat it.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Mysteriously, it can foretell earthquakes. In the daytime, it sleeps in mud at the bottom of a pond. When it awakens, it continually feeds throughout the night.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: It is very territorial. It repels foes by setting off tremors that extend over a three-mile radius.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: As a result of causing tremors by thrashing about, it developed the ability to foretell real quakes.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
pokedex_entries.X: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
pokedex_entries.Y: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything--if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Whiscash is extremely territorial. Just one of these Pokémon will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: If Whiscash goes on a wild rampage, it sets off a quake-like tremor with a radius of over three miles. This Pokémon has the ability to predict real earthquakes.
pokedex_entries.Sun: A glutton that devours anything that moves, it quietly lurks at the bottom of swamps, lying in wait for prey.
pokedex_entries.Moon: Sighting Whiscash leaping from the water is believed to herald an earthquake.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Whiscash shakes the ground at high intensities to intimidate its opponents. It swallows its prey whole—along with mud from the swamp floor.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Its vision is not that good. It senses vibrations in the water with its whiskers to determine the location of its prey.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything—if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: It is very territorial. It repels foes by setting off tremors that extend over a three-mile radius.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: As a result of causing tremors by thrashing about, it developed the ability to foretell real quakes.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Strikes its caudal fin against the swamp bed to shake the ground and startle its prey. It will then swallow the fleeing prey whole. People mistook this behavior as the cause of earthquakes.

name: Barboach
desc: Barboach is a Water/Ground type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Whiskers Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 127 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)080 (Diamond/Pearl)080 (Platinum)040 (X/Y — Mountain Kalos)132 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)093 (Sun/Moon — Alola dex)113 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)228 (Sword/Shield)080 (Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl)097 (Legends: Arceus)137 (The Isle of Armor)060 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Ruby: BARBOACH’s sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This POKéMON hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: BARBOACH’s body is covered with a slimy film. If a foe grabs it, this POKéMON just slips out of the enemy’s grip. This POKéMON grows weak if the slimy coating dries up.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its body is covered with a slimy film. The film acts as a barrier to prevent germs in muddy water from entering the BARBOACH’s body.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: BARBOACH uses its whiskers to taste things just as a person uses his or her tongue to taste things.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.
pokedex_entries.X: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
pokedex_entries.Y: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Barboach’s sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This Pokémon hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Barboach’s body is covered with a slimy film. If a foe grabs it, this Pokémon just slips out of the enemy’s grip. This Pokémon grows weak if the slimy coating dries up.
pokedex_entries.Sun: Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in muddy waters, it can detect its prey’s location.
pokedex_entries.Moon: Its slippery body is hard to grasp, so much so that there are festivals where people compete to see how many they can catch barehanded.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Its entire body is gooey. When pecked at by bird Pokémon, it slips and slides its way to freedom.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Its whiskers are filled with nerves. They can sense smells and flavors just as a person’s nose or tongue would.
pokedex_entries.Sword: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Makes its home in swamps with murky water. The poor visibility hides this Pokémon from predators, and the slime on its body makes grasping it difficult.
