name: Dustox
desc: Dustox is a Bug/Poison type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Poison Moth Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this POKéMON are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: When DUSTOX flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over. This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a pro wrestler sick. This POKéMON searches for food using its antennae like radar.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It scatters horribly toxic dust when it senses danger. They tend to gather in the glow of streetlamps at night.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It is a nocturnal POKéMON that flies from fields and mountains to the attraction of streetlights at night. It looses highly toxic powder from its wings.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: Toxic powder is scattered with each flap. At night, it is known to strip leaves off trees lining boulevards.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It scatters its fine dust all over when it is attacked. It is a nocturnal Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Toxic powder is scattered with each flap. At night, it is known to strip leaves off trees lining boulevards.
pokedex_entries.X: A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
pokedex_entries.Y: It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokémon are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: When Dustox flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over. This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a pro wrestler sick. This Pokémon searches for food using its antennae like radar.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: Dustox are nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Tends to be drawn to bonfires on dark nights. Difficult to chase away from settlements because of the way it scatters highly toxic scales.

location.Legends: Arceus: The Heartwood, Grueling Grove, Floaro Gardens, Veilstone Cape

name: Cascoon
desc: Cascoon is a Bug type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Cocoon Pokémon.

name_origin.cocoon: a pupal casing made by some insects

pokedex_entries.Ruby: CASCOON makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This POKéMON prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: If it is attacked, CASCOON remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This POKéMON will also not forget the pain it endured.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: To avoid detection by its enemies, it hides motionlessly beneath large leaves and in the gaps of branches. It also attaches dead leaves to its body for camouflage.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: It is hot inside its cocoon. All the cells in its body create the energy for it to evolve.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: Encased within its tough cocoon, it endures attacks. It never forgets the appearance of its foes.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It endures attacks with patience, because the more pain before evolution, the sturdier it becomes.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
pokedex_entries.X: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
pokedex_entries.Y: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This Pokémon will also not forget the pain it endured.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: It is hot inside its cocoon. All the cells in its body create the energy for it to evolve.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: Encased within its tough cocoon, it endures attacks. It never forgets the appearance of its foes.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: The silk coating its body is thin but sufficiently strong. Cascoon’s silk has a luster and texture superior to that of Silcoon’s, and clothes made using Cascoon silk are regarded as top-notch.

location.Pearl: Route 205, 206, 207, 208, 209, 210, 211, 212, 213, 214, 215, 218, 221, 222, Eterna Forest, Floaroma Meadow, Fuego Ironworks, Valley Windworks
location.Shining Pearl: Eterna Forest, Grassland Cave, Riverbank Cave, Still-Water Cavern, Sunlit Cavern

name: Beautifly
desc: Beautifly is a Bug/Flying type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Butterfly Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: BEAUTIFLY’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this POKéMON, just leave a potted flower by an open window. BEAUTIFLY is sure to come looking for pollen.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: BEAUTIFLY has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This POKéMON rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: Despite its appearance, it has an aggressive nature. It attacks by jabbing with its long, thin mouth.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its colorfully patterned wings are its most prominent feature. It flies through flower-covered fields collecting pollen. It attacks ferociously when angered.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey’s fluids.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: When flower fields bloom, it flits around, collecting pollen. Despite its appearance, it is savage.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: Despite its looks, it is aggressive. It jabs with its long, thin mouth if disturbed while collecting pollen.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Despite its looks, it is aggressive. It jabs with its long, thin mouth if disturbed while collecting pollen.
pokedex_entries.X: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.
pokedex_entries.Y: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey’s fluids.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Beautifly’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pokémon rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey’s fluids.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: When flower fields bloom, it flits around, collecting pollen. Despite its appearance, it is savage.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: A colorful and incredibly beautiful but also greedy Pokémon. In an effort to keep its favorite food all to itself, it will chase away Combee as they try to gather nectar.

location.Legends: Arceus: The Heartwood, Grueling Grove, Floaro Gardens, Veilstone Cape

name: Silcoon
desc: Silcoon is a Bug type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Cocoon Pokémon.

name_origin.cocoon: a pupal casing made by some insects

pokedex_entries.Ruby: SILCOON tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There, this POKéMON hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: SILCOON was thought to endure hunger and not consume anything before its evolution. However, it is now thought that this POKéMON slakes its thirst by drinking rainwater that collects on its silk.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It conserves its energy by moving as little as possible. It awaits evolution while drinking only a little rainwater.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It prepares for evolution using the energy it stored while it was a WURMPLE. It keeps watch over the surroundings with its two eyes.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: It anchors itself by wrapping twigs with the silk from its body. It motionlessly awaits evolution.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: It drinks dew that collects on its silk and waits for evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: Having wrapped silk around the branches of a tree, it quiescently awaits evolution.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
pokedex_entries.X: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
pokedex_entries.Y: It drinks dew that collects on its silk and waits for evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Silcoon tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There, this Pokémon hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Silcoon was thought to endure hunger and not consume anything before its evolution. However, it is now thought that this Pokémon slakes its thirst by drinking rainwater that collects on its silk.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: It anchors itself by wrapping twigs with the silk from its body. It motionlessly awaits evolution.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: It drinks dew that collects on its silk while it waits for evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Wraps itself in thin strings of silk while it stores energy for evolution. It can’t extend its limbs and its movement is slow, but its eyes keep a sharp lookout—Silcoon is always on guard.

location.Diamond: Route 205, 206, 207, 208, 209, 210, 211, 212, 213, 214, 215, 218, 221, 222, Eterna Forest, Floaroma Meadow, Fuego Ironworks, Valley Windworks
location.Brilliant Diamond: Eterna Forest, Grassland Cave, Riverbank Cave, Still-Water Cavern, Sunlit Cavern

name: Wurmple
desc: Wurmple is a Bug type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Worm Pokémon.

name_origin.apple: a fruit, often eaten by worms

pokedex_entries.Ruby: Using the spikes on its rear end, WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: WURMPLE is targeted by SWELLOW as prey. This POKéMON will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison from the spikes.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It lives amidst tall grass and in forests. When attacked, it resists by pointing its venomous spikes at the foe.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It sticks to tree branches and eats leaves. The thread it spits from its mouth, which becomes gooey when it touches air, slows the movement of its foes.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a STARLY, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: It spits a white silk that turns sticky when it contacts air. It is used to immobilize foes.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: Often targeted by bird Pokémon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Often targeted by bird Pokémon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.
pokedex_entries.X: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
pokedex_entries.Y: It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Using the spikes on its rear end, Wurmple peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This Pokémon’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Wurmple is targeted by Swellow as prey. This Pokémon will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison from the spikes.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: It spits a white silk thread that turns sticky when coming into contact with air. The silk is used to immobilize foes.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Likes sap and is abundant in the wild. Why it evolves into various different forms is unknown. One cannot tell from a Wurmple’s appearance which form it will take when it evolves.

location.DiamondPearl: Route 205, 206, 207, 208, 209, 210, 211, 212, 213, 214, 215, 218, 221, 222, Eterna Forest, Floaroma Meadow, Fuego Ironworks, Valley Windworks
location.Platinum: Route 204, 205, 206, 207, 208, 209, 210, 211, 212, 213, 214, 215, 218, 221, 222, Eterna Forest, Floaroma Meadow, Fuego Ironworks, Valley Windworks

name: Linoone
desc: Linoone is a Normal type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Rushing Pokémon.

name: Zigzagoon
desc: Zigzagoon is a Normal type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the TinyRaccoon Pokémon.

name_origin.zigzag: line that sharply weaves back and forth

name: Mightyena
desc: Mightyena is a Dark type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Bite Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: MIGHTYENA gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This POKéMON will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: MIGHTYENA travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory of its life in the wild compels the POKéMON to obey only those TRAINERS that it recognizes to possess superior skill.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It will always obey the commands of a skilled TRAINER. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: In the wild, MIGHTYENA live in a pack. They never defy their leader’s orders. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.
pokedex_entries.X: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
pokedex_entries.Y: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Mightyena gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This Pokémon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory of its life in the wild compels the Pokémon to obey only those Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.

location.Brilliant Diamond: Route 214, 215, Spacious Cave, Dazzling Cave, Icy Cave, Stargleam Cavern, Glacial Cavern
location.Shining Pearl: Spacious Cave, Dazzling Cave, Icy Cave, Stargleam Cavern, Glacial Cavern

name: Poochyena
desc: Poochyena is a Dark type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Bite Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bite at anything that moves. This POKéMON chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: POOCHYENA is an omnivore - it will eat anything. A distinguishing feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This POKéMON tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its tail bristle out.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It savagely threatens foes with bared fangs. It chases after fleeing targets tenaciously. It turns tail and runs, however, if the foe strikes back.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It chases its prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it turns tail if the prey strikes back.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
pokedex_entries.X: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
pokedex_entries.Y: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: At first sight, Poochyena takes a bite at anything that moves. This Pokémon chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Poochyena is an omnivore—it will eat anything. A distinguishing feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This Pokémon tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its tail bristle out.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.

location.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Spacious Cave, Dazzling Cave, Icy Cave, Stargleam Cavern, Glacial Cavern

name: Swampert
desc: Swampert is a Water/Ground type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Mud Fish Pokémon.

name: Marshtomp
desc: Marshtomp is a Water/Ground type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Mud Fish Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: The surface of MARSHTOMP’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This POKéMON plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: MARSHTOMP is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This POKéMON’s hindquarters exhibit obvious development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It is at its best when on muddy ground with poor footing. It quickly overwhelms foes struggling in mud.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its toughened hind legs enable it to stand upright. Because it weakens if its skin dries out, it replenishes fluids by playing in mud.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: Living on muddy ground that provides poor footing has made its legs sturdy.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.
pokedex_entries.X: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.
pokedex_entries.Y: Living on muddy ground that provides poor footing has made its legs sturdy.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: The surface of Marshtomp’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This Pokémon plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This Pokémon’s hindquarters exhibit obvious development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.

name: Mudkip
desc: Mudkip is a Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Mud Fish Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: The fin on MUDKIP’s head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this POKéMON can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: In water, MUDKIP breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is faced with a tight situation in battle, this POKéMON will unleash its amazing power - it can crush rocks bigger than itself.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: On land, it can powerfully lift large boulders by planting its four feet and heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil at the water’s edge.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: Its power can crush boulders. It rests by covering itself with mud at the bottom of a river.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.
pokedex_entries.X: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.
pokedex_entries.Y: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: The fin on Mudkip’s head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this Pokémon can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is faced with a tight situation in battle, this Pokémon will unleash its amazing power—it can crush rocks bigger than itself.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Using the fin on its head, Mudkip senses the flow of water to keep track of what’s going on around it. Mudkip has the strength to heft boulders.

location.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Fountainspring Cave, Riverbank Cave, Still-Water Cavern

name: Blaziken
desc: Blaziken is a Fire/Fighting type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Blaze Pokémon.

name: Combusken
desc: Combusken is a Fire/Fighting type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Young Fowl Pokémon.

name_origin.combustion: state where something bursts into flames

pokedex_entries.Ruby: COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This POKéMON’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out ten kicks in one second.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: COMBUSKEN battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This POKéMON’s cry is very loud and distracting.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It boosts its concentration by emitting harsh cries. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It lashes out with 10 kicks per second. Its strong fighting instinct compels it to keep up its offensive until the opponent gives up.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
pokedex_entries.X: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
pokedex_entries.Y: During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Combusken toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This Pokémon’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out 10 kicks in one second.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This Pokémon’s cry is very loud and distracting.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.

name: Torchic
desc: Torchic is a Fire type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Chick Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: TORCHIC sticks with its TRAINER, following behind with unsteady steps. This POKéMON breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees F, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: TORCHIC has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame. Give it a hug - it will be glowing with warmth. This POKéMON is covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: If attacked, it strikes back by spitting balls of fire it forms in its stomach. A TORCHIC dislikes darkness because it can’t see its surroundings.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees F.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: Inside its body is a place where it keeps a small flame. Hug it! It will be as warm as a hot-water bottle.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees F.
pokedex_entries.X: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.
pokedex_entries.Y: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Torchic sticks with its Trainer, following behind with unsteady steps. This Pokémon breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame. Give it a hug—it will be glowing with warmth. This Pokémon is covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: A fire burns inside it, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

location.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Volcanic Cave, Sandsear Cave, Typhlo Cavern

name: Sceptile
desc: Sceptile is a Grass type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Forest Pokémon.

name: Grovyle
desc: Grovyle is a Grass type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Wood Gecko Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: The leaves growing out of GROVYLE’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This POKéMON is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: This POKéMON adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no POKéMON can ever hope to catch a fleeing GROVYLE however fast they may be.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Leaves grow out of this POKéMON’s body. They help obscure a GROVYLE from the eyes of its enemies while it is in a thickly overgrown forest.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It leaps from tree branch to tree branch quite swiftly. It shows astounding agility.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.
pokedex_entries.X: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.
pokedex_entries.Y: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: The leaves growing out of Grovyle’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This Pokémon is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no Pokémon can ever hope to catch a fleeing Grovyle however fast they may be.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.

name: Treecko
desc: Treecko is a Grass type Pokémon introduced in Generation 3. It is known as the Wood Gecko Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Ruby: TREECKO has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This POKéMON attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: TREECKO is cool, calm, and collected - it never panics under any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this POKéMON, it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.
pokedex_entries.FireRedLeafGreen: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day’s weather.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It makes its nest in a giant tree in the forest. It ferociously guards against anything nearing its territory. It is said to be the protector of the forest’s trees.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.
pokedex_entries.HeartGoldSoulSilver: Small hooks on the bottom of its feet catch on walls and ceilings. That is how it can hang from above.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.
pokedex_entries.X: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day’s weather.
pokedex_entries.Y: Small hooks on the bottom of its feet catch on walls and ceilings. That is how it can hang from above.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Treecko has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This Pokémon attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Treecko is cool, calm, and collected—it never panics under any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this Pokémon, it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny hooks, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.

name: Celebi

name: Ho-oh
desc: Ho-oh is a Fire/Flying type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Rainbow Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Gold: Legends claim this POKéMON flies the world’s skies continuously on its magnificent seven-colored wings.
pokedex_entries.Silver: A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It will reveal itself before a pure-hearted trainer by shining its bright rainbow-colored wings.

pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: Its feathers are in seven colors. It is said that anyone seeing it is promised eternal happiness.

name: Lugia

name: Suicune

pokedex_entries.Silver: A POKéMON that races across the land while barking a cry that sounds like crashing thunder.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: This rough POKéMON stores energy inside its body, then sweeps across the land, shooting off electricity.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: RAIKOU embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of this POKéMON send shock waves shuddering through the air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come crashing down.

pokedex_entries.Gold: Anyone who takes even one bite of BLISSEY’s egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone.

pokedex_entries.Crystal: Biting into one of the delicious eggs that BLISSEY provides will make everyone around smile with joy.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: BLISSEY senses sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this POKéMON will rush over to the sad person, however far they may be, to share an egg of happiness that brings a smile to any face.

pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Their eggs are such a delicacy that some say eating one will bring you happiness. These eggs fetch the highest prices on the market.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: This Pokémon is overflowing with love. Only Chansey that share a strong bond with their Trainer can evolve, so people say.

pokedex_entries.Silver: It is found in volcanic craters. Its body temp. is over 1100 degrees, so don’t underestimate it.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It naturally spits an 1100-degree flame. It is said when many appear, it heralds a volcanic eruption.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: MAGBY’s state of health is determined by observing the fire it breathes. If the POKéMON is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It is found in volcanic craters. Its body heat exceeds 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit, so don’t underestimate it.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: If a MAGBY is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearl: Its body temperature is around 1,100 degrees F. It is healthy if it is breathing yellow flames.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: Its magma-like blood circulates throughout its body. Its body’s heat can top 1,100 degrees F.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble from its mouth and nostrils.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It is found in volcanic craters. Its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit, so don’t underestimate it.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: Its magma-like blood circulates throughout its body. Its body’s heat can top 1,100 degrees F.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: It’s small, but its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees F. Embers escape its mouth and nose when it breathes.
pokedex_entries.X: It’s small, but its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. Embers escape its mouth and nose when it breathes.
pokedex_entries.Y: Its magma-like blood circulates throughout its body. Its body’s heat can top 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Magby’s state of health is determined by observing the fire it breathes. If the Pokémon is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
pokedex_entries.Sun: Many of these Pokémon can be seen in areas with volcanic activity. Feeding can get them so excited, they exhale flames of 1,100 degrees F.
pokedex_entries.Moon: A famous potter lives with a Magby. Apparently its soft flames produce fine works.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: When flames drip from its nose, that means it has a cold. Have it lie down for a nice rest in some magma.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Its body temperature is always around 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. If Magby falls into a small- enough pond, the whole thing will dry up.
pokedex_entries.Sword: This Pokémon is still small and timid. Whenever Magby gets excited or surprised, flames leak from its mouth and its nose.
pokedex_entries.Shield: This Pokémon makes its home near volcanoes. At the end of the day, Magby soaks in magma, resting and recovering from the day’s fatigue.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Its body temperature is around 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. It is healthy if it is exhaling yellow flames.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: This Pokémon lives in volcanic areas. With each breath, sparks spurt from its mouth and nose. When Magby is in good health, its flames gain a yellow tint.

location.SwordShield: Slippery Slope, Frostpoint Field, Giant's Bed, Old Cemetery, Snowslide Slope, Giant's Foot, Three-Point Pass, Ballimere Lake
location.Shining Pearl: Volcanic Cave, Sandsear Cave, Typhlo Cavern

name: Elekid
desc: Elekid is an Electric type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Electric Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 154 (Gold/Silver/Crystal)197 (Platinum)156 (HeartGold/SoulSilver)056 (Black 2/White 2)226 (Sun/Moon — Alola dex)295 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)182 (Legends: Arceus)015 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Gold: It rotates its arms to generate electricity, but it tires easily, so it charges up only a little bit.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Even in the most vicious storm, this POKéMON plays happily if thunder rumbles in the sky.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It loves violent thunder. The space between its horns flickers bluish-white when it is charging energy.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: ELEKID stores electricity in its body. If it touches metal and accidentally discharges all its built-up electricity, this POKéMON begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Even in the most vicious storm, this POKéMON plays happily if thunder rumbles in the sky.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: It rotates its arms to generate electricity, but it tires easily, so it charges up only a little bit.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: If it touches metal and discharges the electricity it has stored in its body, an ELEKID begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearl: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can’t store the energy it makes.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: A weak electric current flows between its horns. Sticking a hand there shocks the unwary.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It rotates its arms to generate electricity, but it tires easily, so it only charges up a little bit.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Even in the most vicious storm, this Pokémon plays happily if thunder rumbles in the sky.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: A weak electric current flows between its horns. Sticking a hand there shocks the unwary.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: Spinning its arms around to generate electricity makes the area between its horns shine light blue.
pokedex_entries.X: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can’t store the energy it makes.
pokedex_entries.Y: Spinning its arms around to generate electricity makes the area between its horns shine light blue.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Elekid stores electricity in its body. If it touches metal and accidentally discharges all its built-up electricity, this Pokémon begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.
pokedex_entries.Sun: When it’s in a house, electrical outlets serve as its baby bottles. It sucks down electricity.
pokedex_entries.Moon: This Pokémon is constantly fighting with Togedemaru that try to steal its electricity. It’s a pretty even match.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: When it hears the crash of thunder, Elekid’s mood improves. It can be useful to record that sound and play it when Elekid’s feeling down.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: When its horns shine a bluish white, that’s the sign it’s fully charged. You’ll get a shocking jolt if you touch it!
pokedex_entries.Sword: When a storm approaches, this Pokémon gets restless. Once Elekid hears the sound of thunder, it gets full-on rowdy.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It’s not good at storing electricity yet. This Pokémon sneaks into people’s homes, looking for electrical outlets to eat electricity from.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can’t store the energy it makes.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: They generate electricity by spinning their arms. During a thunderstorm, if one hears the lively voices of children out in the wilderness, what one is actually hearing are the voices of Elekid.

name: Smoochum
desc: Smoochum is an Ice/Psychic type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Kiss Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 152 (Gold/Silver/Crystal)154 (HeartGold/SoulSilver)083 (X/Y — Mountain Kalos)109 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)013 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.Gold: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: The sensitivity of its lips develops most quickly. It uses them to try to identify unknown objects.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: SMOOCHUM actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn’t become dirty.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It actively runs about, but also falls often. Whenever it falls, it will check its reflection on a lake’s surface to make sure its face hasn’t become dirty.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: Its lips are the most sensitive part of its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
pokedex_entries.X: Its lips are the most sensitive part of its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
pokedex_entries.Y: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Smoochum actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn’t become dirty.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: When it examines things, before touching them with its hands, it makes lip contact and then diligently licks all the dirt off its lips.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Highly perceptive sensors, Smoochum’s lips are kept moist by its daily application of tree sap.
pokedex_entries.Sword: If its face gets even slightly dirty, Smoochum will bathe immediately. But if its body gets dirty, Smoochum doesn’t really seem to care.
pokedex_entries.Shield: This is a very curious Pokémon. Smoochum decides what it likes and dislikes by touching things with its lips.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.

location.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Lake Acuity, Dazzling Cave, Icy Cave, Stargleam Cavern, Glacial Cavern

name: Hitmontop
desc: Hitmontop is a Fighting type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Handstand Pokémon.

name_origin.top: spinning top on which it’s based

pokedex_entries.Gold: If you become enchanted by its smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get drilled hard.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: After doing a handstand to throw off the opponent’s timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: HITMONTOP spins on its head at high speed, all the while delivering kicks. This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same time. The POKéMON travels faster spinning than it does walking.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: If you become enchanted by its smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get drilled hard.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its technique of kicking while spinning is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense. HITMONTOP travel faster spinning than they do walking.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by ten.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: If you are enchanted by its smooth, dance-like kicks, you may get a closer experience with one than you’d like.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by ten.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by 10.
pokedex_entries.X: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by 10.
pokedex_entries.Y: If you are enchanted by its smooth, dance-like kicks, you may get a closer experience with one than you’d like.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Hitmontop spins on its head at high speed, all the while delivering kicks. This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same time. The Pokémon travels faster spinning than it does walking.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.
pokedex_entries.Shield: After doing a handstand to throw off the opponent’s timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by a factor of 10.

name: Tyrogue
desc: Tyrogue is a Fighting type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Scuffle Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Gold: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Even though it is small, it can’t be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: To brush up on its fighting skills, it will challenge anyone. It has a very strong competitive spirit.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: TYROGUE becomes stressed out if it does not get to train every day. When raising this POKéMON, the TRAINER must establish and uphold various training methods.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Even though it is small, it can’t be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: TYROGUE become stressed out if they do not get to train every day. When raising this POKéMON, the TRAINER must establish a regular training schedule.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It is famous for its eagerness to fight and always nurses injuries from challenging larger foes.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Even though it is small, it can’t be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It is famous for its eagerness to fight and always nurses injuries from challenging larger foes.
pokedex_entries.X: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
pokedex_entries.Y: To brush up on its fighting skills, it will challenge anyone. It has a very strong competitive spirit.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Tyrogue becomes stressed out if it does not get to train every day. When raising this Pokémon, the Trainer must establish and uphold various training methods.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Even though it is small, it can’t be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It is famous for its eagerness to fight and always nurses injuries from challenging larger foes.

name: Smeargle
desc: Smeargle is a Normal type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Painter Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Gold: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: The color of the mysterious fluid secreted from its tail is predetermined for each SMEARGLE.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: SMEARGLE marks the boundaries of its territory using a body fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this POKéMON have been found.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A SMEARGLE marks its territory using a fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. About 5,000 different marks left by this POKéMON have been found.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
pokedex_entries.X: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
pokedex_entries.Y: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Smeargle marks the boundaries of its territory using a body fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this Pokémon have been found.
pokedex_entries.Sun: The unique creations produced by each Smeargle are painted using the fluid that oozes from its tail. This is how it marks its territory.
pokedex_entries.Moon: It draws symbols all over the place to mark its territory. In towns with many Smeargle, the walls are covered in graffiti.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: The fluid of Smeargle’s tail secretions changes in the intensity of its hue as the Pokémon’s emotions change.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.

name: Stantler
desc: Stantler is a Normal type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Big Horn Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Gold: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: The round balls found on the fallen antlers can be ground into a powder that aids in sleeping.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: STANTLER’s magnificent antlers were traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this POKéMON was hunted close to extinction by those who were after the priceless antlers.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Its curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: STANTLER’s magnificent antlers were once traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this POKéMON was hunted close to extinction.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.
pokedex_entries.X: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.
pokedex_entries.Y: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.

pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Its strangely shaped antlers have the power to bewitch those who see them. Medicine made by grinding up the black orbs from fallen antlers is an effective treatment for insomnia.

location.Legends: Arceus: Deertrack Heights, Wayward Wood, Windbreak Stand

name: Porygon2
desc: Porygon2 is a Normal type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Virtual Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 216 (Gold/Silver/Crystal)193 (Platinum)221 (HeartGold/SoulSilver)218 (Sun/Moon — Alola dex)282 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)134 (Legends: Arceus)209 (The Isle of Armor)

pokedex_entries.Gold: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. It can’t fly, though.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: This manmade POKéMON evolved from the latest technology. It may have unprogrammed reactions.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: PORYGON2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made POKéMON has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. However, it can’t even fly.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It was created by humans using the power of science. It has been given artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearl: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. It can’t fly, however.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.
pokedex_entries.X: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
pokedex_entries.Y: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Porygon2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made Pokémon has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
pokedex_entries.Sun: For the purposes of planetary development, Porygon was updated with the most cutting-edge technology available.
pokedex_entries.Moon: Porygon was updated to a new version in readiness for planetary development. But that dream remains unrealized as yet.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: AI has been installed in it. It learns various things all on its own, but it even remembers things it doesn’t need to know.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Even though it doesn’t die in the vacuum of space, it can’t move around very well in zero gravity.
pokedex_entries.Sword: This is a Porygon that was updated with special data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about many different subjects all on its own.
pokedex_entries.Shield: After artificial intelligence was implemented in Porygon2, the Pokémon began using a strange language that only other Porygon2 understand.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: A bizarre item caused this Pokémon to evolve. While it now exhibits many new gestures and expressions, its biology remains inscrutable.

name: Donphan
desc: Donphan is a Ground type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Armor Pokémon.

name_origin.don: of great size/importance; lord or master

pokedex_entries.Gold: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough to knock down a house.
pokedex_entries.Silver: The longer and bigger its tusks, the higher its rank in its herd. The tusks take long to grow.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: Because this POKéMON’s skin is so tough, a normal attack won’t even leave a scratch on it.
pokedex_entries.Ruby: DONPHAN’s favorite attack is curling its body into a ball, then charging at its foe while rolling at high speed. Once it starts rolling, this POKéMON can’t stop very easily.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: If DONPHAN were to tackle with its hard body, even a house could be destroyed. Using its massive strength, the POKéMON helps clear rock and mud slides that block mountain trails.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: The longer and bigger its tusks, the higher its rank in its herd. The tusks take a long time to grow.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough to knock down a house.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A DONPHAN is so strong it can easily haul a dump truck. Its hide has toughened to a rock-hard state. An ordinary sort of attack won’t even leave a scratch.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It attacks by curling up, then rolling into its foe. It can blow apart a house in one hit.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its tackle is strong enough to knock down a house.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: The longer and bigger its tusks, the higher its rank in its herd. The tusks take long to grow.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It attacks by curling up, then rolling into its foe. It can blow apart a house in one hit.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: It attacks by curling up then rolling into its foe. It can blow apart a house in one hit.
pokedex_entries.X: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its Tackle is strong enough to knock down a house.
pokedex_entries.Y: The longer and bigger its tusks, the higher its rank in its herd. The tusks take long to grow.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Donphan’s favorite attack is curling its body into a ball, then charging at its foe while rolling at high speed. Once it starts rolling, this Pokémon can’t stop very easily.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: If Donphan were to tackle with its hard body, even a house could be destroyed. Using its massive strength, the Pokémon helps clear rock and mud slides that block mountain trails.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It attacks by curling up and rolling into its foe. It can blow apart a house in one hit.

name: Phanpy
desc: Phanpy is a Ground type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Long Nose Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Gold: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous.
pokedex_entries.Silver: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: During the deserted morning hours, it comes ashore where it deftly uses its trunk to take a shower.
pokedex_entries.Ruby: For its nest, PHANPY digs a vertical pit in the ground at the edge of a river. It marks the area around its nest with its trunk to let the others know that the area has been claimed.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: PHANPY uses its long nose to shower itself. When others gather around, they thoroughly douse each other with water. These POKéMON can be seen drying their soaking-wet bodies at the edge of water.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, this can be dangerous.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: PHANPY’s big ears serve as broad fans. When it becomes hot, it flaps the ears busily to cool down. Even the young are very strong.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
pokedex_entries.X: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
pokedex_entries.Y: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: For its nest, Phanpy digs a vertical pit in the ground at the edge of a river. It marks the area around its nest with its trunk to let the others know that the area has been claimed.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Phanpy uses its long nose to shower itself. When others gather around, they thoroughly douse each other with water. These Pokémon can be seen drying their soaking-wet bodies at the edge of water.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.

location.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Route 207, Rocky Cave, Big Bluff Cavern

pokedex_entries.Sapphire: KINGDRA sleeps on the seafloor where it is otherwise devoid of life. When a storm arrives, the POKéMON is said to awaken and wander about in search of prey.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It sleeps deep on the ocean floor to build its energy. It is said to cause tornadoes as it wakes.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.

pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It sleeps deep on the ocean floor to build its energy. It is said to cause tornadoes as it wakes.

pokedex_entries.Crystal: Around dawn, its ominous howl echoes through the area to announce that this is its territory.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: HOUNDOUR hunt as a coordinated pack. They communicate with each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey. This POKéMON’s remarkable teamwork is unparalleled.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: To corner prey, they check each other’s location using barks that only they can understand.

pokedex_entries.DiamondPearl: It conveys its feelings using different cries. It works in a pack to cleverly take down prey.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It uses a variety of cries for communicating with others.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It uses different kinds of cries for communicating with others of its kind and for pursuing its prey.

name: Skarmory
desc: Skarmory is a Steel/Flying type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Armor Bird Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 198 (Gold/Silver/Crystal)115 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)203 (HeartGold/SoulSilver)203 (Black 2/White 2)112 (X/Y — Mountain Kalos)120 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)208 (Sun/Moon — Alola dex)270 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)153 (The Isle of Armor)

pokedex_entries.Gold: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
pokedex_entries.Silver: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: The feathers that it sheds are very sharp. It is said that people once used the feathers as swords.
pokedex_entries.Ruby: SKARMORY is entirely encased in hard, protective armor. This POKéMON flies at close to 190 mph. It slashes foes with its wings that possess swordlike cutting edges.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: SKARMORY’s steel wings become tattered and bashed in from repeated battles. Once a year, the battered wings grow back completely, restoring the cutting edges to their pristine state.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but its bones are hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A POKéMON that has a body and wings of steel. People in the past used feathers fallen from SKARMORY to make swords and knives.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: Its heavy-looking iron body is actually thin and light, so it can fly at speeds over 180 mph.
pokedex_entries.X: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
pokedex_entries.Y: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Skarmory is entirely encased in hard, protective armor. This Pokémon flies at close to 190 mph. It slashes foes with its wings that possess swordlike cutting edges.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Skarmory’s steel wings become tattered and bashed in from repeated battles. Once a year, the battered wings grow back completely, restoring the cutting edges to their pristine state.
pokedex_entries.Sun: Its feathers, which fall off as it grows, are thin and sharp. In times long past, warriors used them as swords.
pokedex_entries.Moon: Its metal body is sturdy, but it does rust rather easily. So on rainy days, this Pokémon prefers to stay put in its nest.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: The wing feathers it sheds can be processed and made into knives whose sharpness is recognized by the finest chefs.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Its body is draped in steel armor. It looks heavy, but it can fly at speeds of up to 185 miles an hour!
pokedex_entries.Sword: The pointed feathers of these Pokémon are sharper than swords. Skarmory and Corviknight fight viciously over territory.
pokedex_entries.Shield: People fashion swords from Skarmory’s shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Skarmory is clad entirely in ironhard armor. It flies at speeds over 180 mph.

pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Many people have taken up surfing because they admire how magnificently Mantine swims.

pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: This calm and gentle Pokémon swims gracefully through the sea. After building speed, it can leap out of the water. It is often misidentified as a bird Pokémon due to this behavior.

pokedex_entries.Gold: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

pokedex_entries.Crystal: Its instinct is to bury itself in holes. It often steals the nesting holes of others to sleep in them.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: OCTILLERY grabs onto its foe using its tentacles. This POKéMON tries to immobilize it before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, OCTILLERY spews ink to escape.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fellow OCTILLERY.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It ensnares its foe with its suction-cupped tentacles before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, it spews ink to escape.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: It lives in the gaps of boulders and in holes on the seafloor. Its suction cups grip prey tightly.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: It obscures its foe’s vision by spitting a cloud of murky ink. It makes its nest among boulders.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It loves to lurk inside holes in rocks. It sometimes sprays ink on prey by sticking out only its mouth.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It traps foes with the suction cups on its tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fellow OCTILLERY.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It loves to lurk inside holes in rocks. It sometimes sprays ink on prey by sticking out only its mouth.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
pokedex_entries.X: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
pokedex_entries.Y: It traps foes with the suction cups on its tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Octillery grabs onto its foe using its tentacles. This Pokémon tries to immobilize it before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, Octillery spews ink to escape.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: The ink it spits when escaping is special. It contains a substance that dulls the sense of smell, so Pokémon with keen noses get lost.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: It usually sleeps in caves. The pitch-black ink that Octillery spits is also used for cooking.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: It lives in the gaps of boulders and in holes on the seafloor. Its suction cups grip prey tightly.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: It obscures its foe’s vision by spitting a cloud of black ink. It makes its nest among boulders.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: While Octillery still shoots water from its mouth, the drastic anatomical difference between it and Remoraid meant that for a long time, no one believed the former evolved from the latter.

pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.

pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: With its excellent sense of smell, it’s even able to find mushrooms that are buried under frozen ground.
pokedex_entries.X: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
pokedex_entries.Y: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Piloswine is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables it to endure the freezing cold. This Pokémon uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.
pokedex_entries.Sword: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Its shaggy coat makes it unable to see. It checks surroundings with its sensitive nose instead.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: The long fur of this Pokémon covers its eyes, ears, and even limbs, allowing Piloswine to resist harshly frigid conditions. The Pokémon’s white tusks can be used to defeat its enemies.

name: Swinub
desc: Swinub is an Ice/Ground type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Pig Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.Silver: If it smells something enticing, it dashes headlong off to find the source of the aroma.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It uses the tip of its nose to dig for food. Its nose is so tough that even frozen ground poses no problem.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: SWINUB roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This POKéMON occasionally roots out hot springs.

pokedex_entries.DiamondPearl: It loves eating mushrooms that grow under dead grass. It also finds hot springs while foraging.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It has a very sensitive nose. It can locate mushrooms, berries, and even hot springs buried under ice.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It has a very sensitive nose. It can locate mushrooms, berries, and even hot springs buried under ice.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: Rooting the tip of its snout into the ground, it searches for food. Sometimes it even digs up a hot spring.
pokedex_entries.X: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
pokedex_entries.Y: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Swinub roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This Pokémon occasionally roots out hot springs.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
pokedex_entries.Shield: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It loves eating mushrooms that grow under dead grass. It also finds hot springs while foraging.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Swinub excels at sniffing out mushrooms buried beneath grass or snow. Since ancient times, the people of Hisui have often relied upon this skill.

name: Magcargo
desc: Magcargo is a Fire/Rock type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Lava Pokémon.

name_origin.magma: the melted rock in a volcano

pokedex_data.Abilities: 1. Magma Armor2. Flame BodyWeak Armor (hidden ability)

pokedex_entries.Gold: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. It breaks easily with a slight touch.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing. Flames will occasionally burst from its shell.
pokedex_entries.Ruby: MAGCARGO’s shell is actually its skin that hardened as a result of cooling. Its shell is very brittle and fragile - just touching it causes it to crumble apart. This POKéMON returns to its original size by dipping itself in magma.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: MAGCARGO’s body temperature is approximately 18,000 degrees F. Water is vaporized on contact. If this POKéMON is caught in the rain, the raindrops instantly turn into steam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. It breaks easily with a slight touch.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: The shell on its back is made of hardened magma. Tens of thousands of years spent living in volcanic craters have turned MAGCARGO’s bodies into magma.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: Its body temperature is roughly 18,000 degrees F. Flames spout from gaps in its hardened shell.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. It breaks easily with a slight touch.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Its body temperature is roughly 18,000 degrees F. Flames spout from gaps in its hardened shell.
pokedex_entries.X: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.
pokedex_entries.Y: Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing. Flames will occasionally burst from its shell.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Magcargo’s shell is actually its skin that hardened as a result of cooling. Its shell is very brittle and fragile—just touching it causes it to crumble apart. This Pokémon returns to its original size by dipping itself in magma.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Magcargo’s body temperature is approximately 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact. If this Pokémon is caught in the rain, the raindrops instantly turn into steam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Its body temperature is roughly 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Flames burst from gaps in its shell made of hardened magma.
