desc: Golbat is a Poison/Flying type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Bat Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 042 (Yellow/Red/Blue)038 (Gold/Silver/Crystal)064 (Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald)042 (FireRed/LeafGreen)029 (Diamond/Pearl)029 (Platinum)038 (HeartGold/SoulSilver)062 (Black 2/White 2)146 (X/Y — Central Kalos)066 (Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire)069 (Sun/Moon — Alola dex)081 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)042 (Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee)029 (Brilliant Diamond/Shining Pearl)035 (Legends: Arceus)145 (The Crown Tundra)

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and suck blood.
pokedex_entries.Gold: However hard its victim’s hide may be, it punctures with sharp fangs and gorges itself with blood.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It can drink more than 10 ounces of blood at once. If it has too much, it gets heavy and flies clumsily.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: When it plunges its fangs into its prey, it instantly draws and gulps down more than ten ounces of blood.
pokedex_entries.Ruby: GOLBAT loves to drink the blood of living things. It is particularly active in the pitch black of night. This POKéMON flits around in the night skies, seeking fresh blood.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: GOLBAT bites down on prey with its four fangs and drinks the victim’s blood. It becomes active on inky dark moonless nights, flying around to attack people and POKéMON.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It clamps down on its prey with needle-sharp fangs and drains over 10 ounces of blood in one gulp.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its fangs easily puncture even thick animal hide. It loves to feast on the blood of people and POKéMON. It flits about in darkness and strikes from behind.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: It loves the blood of humans and Pokémon. It flies around at night in search of neck veins.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: Its sharp fangs puncture the toughest of hides and have small holes for greedily sucking blood.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: However hard its victim’s hide may be, it punctures with sharp fangs and gorges itself with blood.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It can drink more than 10 ounces of blood at once. If it has too much, it gets heavy and flies clumsily.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: Its sharp fangs puncture the toughest of hides and have small holes for greedily sucking blood.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: Flitting around in the dead of night, it sinks its fangs into its prey and drains a nearly fatal amount of blood.
pokedex_entries.X: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
pokedex_entries.Y: Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Golbat loves to drink the blood of living things. It is particularly active in the pitch black of night. This Pokémon flits around in the night skies, seeking fresh blood.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Golbat bites down on prey with its four fangs and drinks the victim’s blood. It becomes active on inky dark moonless nights, flying around to attack people and Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.Sun: Its thick fangs are hollow like straws, making them unexpectedly fragile. These fangs are specialized for sucking blood.
pokedex_entries.Moon: Sometimes they drink so much blood, they can’t fly anymore. Then they fall to the ground and become food for other Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Every once in a while, you’ll see a Golbat that’s missing some fangs. This happens when hunger drives it to try biting a Steel-type Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: They can suck down over 10 ounces of blood in one go. They have been known to drink so much blood that they can no longer fly.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and to suck blood.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It loves to drink other creatures’ blood. It’s said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it’s gathered.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Its feet are tiny, but this Pokémon walks skillfully. It sneaks up on sleeping prey before sinking in its fangs and slurping up blood.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: It loves the blood of humans and Pokémon. It flies around at night in search of neck veins.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: It sinks its sharp fangs into other creatures and slurps up their blood. A closer look at the fangs reveals that they are hollow and akin to straws.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for objects in its way.
pokedex_entries.Gold: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: During the day, it gathers with others and hangs from the ceilings of old buildings and caves.
pokedex_entries.Ruby: ZUBAT remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: ZUBAT avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echo location to flit about in darkness.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: It forms colonies in perpetually dark places and uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: While living in pitch-black caverns, their eyes gradually grew shut and deprived them of vision. They use ultrasonic waves to detect obstacles.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: Disliking sunlight, it sleeps deep in forests and caves until sundown.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: It does not need eyes, because it emits ultrasonic waves to check its surroundings while it flies.
pokedex_entries.X: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.Y: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echolocation to flit about in darkness.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Zubat remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Zubat avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.
pokedex_entries.Sun: It sleeps in caves during the day. It has no eyes, so to check its surroundings while flying, it emits ultrasonic waves.
pokedex_entries.Moon: When exposed to sunlight, they suffer burns. The frequency of their ultrasonic waves can differ slightly from colony to colony.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: It has no eyeballs, so it can’t see. It checks its surroundings via the ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Their skin is so thin that they’ll be burned if sunlight hits them. When it gets cold out, they gather together to warm one another’s bodies.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for objects in its way.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Zubat live in caves, down where the sun’s light won’t reach. In the morning, they gather together to keep each other warm as they sleep.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: Disliking sunlight, it sleeps deep in forests and caves until sundown.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Makes its home in gloomy caves. Atrophied eyes have left this Pokémon blind, so it scans its surroundings via sound waves that it emits from its mouth as it flies.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.
pokedex_entries.Gold: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won’t want to be separated.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a BODY SLAM.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: The rich, fluffy fur that covers its body feels so good that anyone who feels it can’t stop touching it.
pokedex_entries.Ruby: WIGGLYTUFF has large, saucerlike eyes. The surfaces of its eyes are always covered with a thin layer of tears. If any dust gets in this POKéMON’s eyes, it is quickly washed away.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: WIGGLYTUFF’s body is very flexible. By inhaling deeply, this POKéMON can inflate itself seemingly without end. Once inflated, WIGGLYTUFF bounces along lightly like a balloon.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Its fur is extremely fine, dense, and supple. The exquisitely pleasant fur conveys an image of luxury.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its fur is the ultimate in luxuriousness. Sleeping alongside a WIGGLYTUFF is simply divine. Its body expands seemingly without end when it inhales.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won’t want to be separated.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: Its fine fur feels so pleasant, those who accidentally touch it cannot take their hands away.
pokedex_entries.X: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won’t want to be separated.
pokedex_entries.Y: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Wigglytuff has large, saucerlike eyes. The surfaces of its eyes are always covered with a thin layer of tears. If any dust gets in this Pokémon’s eyes, it is quickly washed away.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: Wigglytuff’s body is very flexible. By inhaling deeply, this Pokémon can inflate itself seemingly without end. Once inflated, Wigglytuff bounces along lightly like a balloon.
pokedex_entries.Sun: It sheds its fine fur when the seasons change. The fur is gathered and spun into a luxurious yarn.
pokedex_entries.Moon: As it inhales, it expands...and expands...and expands. Wigglytuff compete to see which one can inflate itself the most.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Thanks to its bouncy body and fine fur, this Pokémon is sought after. Holding one in your arms while you sleep feels great.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: When it gets angry, it inhales with all its might, and its body gradually inflates. Sometimes they can grow 20 times larger!
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Its body is very elastic. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.
pokedex_entries.Sword: The more air it takes in, the more it inflates. If opponents catch it in a bad mood, it will inflate itself to an enormous size to intimidate them.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It’s proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate. In particular, the curl on its forehead has a texture that’s perfectly heavenly.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.
pokedex_entries.Gold: If it inflates to SING a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Looking into its cute, round eyes causes it to sing a relaxing melody, inducing its enemies to sleep.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It rolls its cute eyes as it sings a soothing lullaby. Its gentle song puts anyone who hears it to sleep.
pokedex_entries.Ruby: JIGGLYPUFF’s vocal chords can freely adjust the wavelength of its voice. This POKéMON uses this ability to sing at precisely the right wavelength to make its foes most drowsy.
pokedex_entries.Sapphire: When this POKéMON sings, it never pauses to breathe. If it is in a battle against an opponent that does not easily fall asleep, JIGGLYPUFF cannot breathe, endangering its life.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Nothing can avoid falling asleep hearing a JIGGLYPUFF’s song. The sound waves of its singing voice match the brain waves of someone in a deep sleep.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: If it inflates to sing a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Looking into its cute, round eyes causes it to sing a relaxing melody, inducing its enemies to sleep.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: Looking into its cute, round eyes makes it start singing a song so pleasant listeners can’t help but fall asleep.
pokedex_entries.X: It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.
pokedex_entries.Y: If it inflates to sing a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby: Jigglypuff’s vocal cords can freely adjust the wavelength of its voice. This Pokémon uses this ability to sing at precisely the right wavelength to make its foes most drowsy.
pokedex_entries.Alpha Sapphire: When this Pokémon sings, it never pauses to breathe. If it is in a battle against an opponent that does not easily fall asleep, Jigglypuff cannot breathe, endangering its life.
pokedex_entries.Sun: It hugely inflates its stomach and sings a mysterious melody. If you hear this melody, you’ll become sleepy right away.
pokedex_entries.Moon: Jigglypuff possess a vocal range that exceeds 12 octaves, but each individual’s singing skill depends on its own effort.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Recordings of Jigglypuff’s strange lullabies can be purchased from department stores. These CDs can be found near the bedding area.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: The songs they sing are totally different depending on the region they live in. Some even sound like they’re shouting!
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Uses its cute round eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.
pokedex_entries.Sword: Jigglypuff has top-notch lung capacity, even by comparison to other Pokémon. It won’t stop singing its lullabies until its foes fall asleep.
pokedex_entries.Shield: By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: They appear to be very protective of their own world. It is a kind of fairy, rarely seen by people.
pokedex_entries.Gold: With its acute hearing, it can pick up sounds from far away. It usually hides in quiet places.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Its very sensitive ears lets it distinguish distant sounds. As a result, it prefers quiet places.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: Said to live in quiet, remote mountains, this type of fairy has a strong aversion to being seen.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: CLEFABLE moves by skipping lightly as if it were flying using its wings. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. It is known to take strolls on lakes on quiet, moonlit nights.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It has an acute sense of hearing. It can easily hear a pin being dropped nearly 1,100 yards away.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A CLEFABLE uses its wings to skip lightly as if it were flying. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. On quiet, moonlit nights, it strolls on lakes.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: Rarely seen by people, it is said to be drawn by the full moon to play at deserted lakes.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: Its hearing is so acute it can hear a pin drop over half a mile away. It lives on quiet mountains.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It is very wary and rarely shows itself to people. Its ears can hear a pin drop over half a mile away.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: With its acute hearing, it can pick up sounds from far away. It usually hides in quiet places.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Its very sensitive ears let it distinguish distant sounds. As a result, it prefers quiet places.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It is very wary and rarely shows itself to people. Its ears can hear a pin drop over half a mile away.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin drop from over a mile away, so they’re usually found in quiet places.
pokedex_entries.X: Its hearing is so acute it can hear a pin drop over half a mile away. It lives on quiet mountains.
pokedex_entries.Y: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Clefable moves by skipping lightly as if it were flying using its wings. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. It is known to take strolls on lakes on quiet, moonlit nights.
pokedex_entries.Sun: They don’t like to reveal themselves in front of people. They live quietly in packs deep in the mountains.
pokedex_entries.Moon: According to tradition, people who see a pair of Clefable skipping by can look forward to a happy marriage.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: It can’t help but hear a pin drop from over half a mile away, so it lives deep in the mountains where there aren’t many people or Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Some scientists believe that it gazes intently at the sky on nights with a full moon because it’s homesick.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: They appear to be very protective of their own world. It is a kind of fairy, rarely seen by people.
pokedex_entries.Sword: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin drop from over a mile away, so they’re usually found in quiet places.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: Rarely seen by people, it is said to be drawn by the full moon to play at deserted lakes.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: Its hearing is so acute it can hear a pin drop over half a mile away. It lives on quiet mountains.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: Legend says that on clear, quiet nights, it listens for the voices of its kin living on the moon. I, too, often think of my homeland, so far away.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Adored for their cute looks and playfulness. They are thought to be rare, as they do not appear often.
pokedex_entries.Gold: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Its adorable behavior and cry make it highly popular. However, this cute POKéMON is rarely found.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: Though rarely seen, it becomes easier to spot, for some reason, on the night of a full moon.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: On every night of a full moon, groups of this POKéMON come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired CLEFAIRY return to their quiet mountain retreats and go to sleep nestled up against each other.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Its adorable appearance makes it popular as a pet. However, it is rare and difficult to find.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: With its magical and cute appeal, it has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: On every night of a full moon, they come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired CLEFAIRY go to sleep nestled up against each other in deep and quiet mountains.
pokedex_entries.Diamond: Thought to live with others on quiet mountains, it is popular for its adorable nature.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: It flies using the wings on its back to collect moonlight. This Pokémon is difficult to find.
pokedex_entries.Platinum: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of CLEFAIRY dancing under a full moon.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Its adorable behavior and cry make it highly popular. However, this cute Pokémon is rarely found.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhite: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
pokedex_entries.Black 2White 2: On nights with a full moon, Clefairy gather from all over and dance. Bathing in moonlight makes them float.
pokedex_entries.X: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
pokedex_entries.Y: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: On every night of a full moon, groups of this Pokémon come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired Clefairy return to their quiet mountain retreats and go to sleep nestled up against each other.
pokedex_entries.Sun: Its adorable behavior and appearance make it popular with men and women, young and old. Its numbers are few, however.
pokedex_entries.Moon: On nights with a full moon, they gather together and dance. The surrounding area is enveloped in an abnormal magnetic field.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: They’re popular, but they’re rare. Trainers who show them off recklessly may be targeted by thieves.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Bathed in moonlight, its wings glow faintly. Without even flapping, Clefairy rises into the air, where it dances around.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Adored for their cute looks and playfulness. They are thought to be rare, as they do not appear often.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Its adorable behavior and cry make it highly popular. However, this cute Pokémon is rarely found.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond: Thought to live with others on quiet mountains, it is popular for its adorable nature.
pokedex_entries.Shining Pearl: Moonlight gathers on the wings on Clefairy’s back, allowing Clefairy to fly. This Pokémon is difficult to find.
pokedex_entries.Legends: Arceus: It can be found in quiet mountain areas on a full moon’s night. Its dancing and its tiny, faintly glowing wings confer upon it a lovely fairylike quality.

name: Nidoking
desc: Nidoking is a Poison/Ground type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Drill Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey’s bones.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle. Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.
pokedex_entries.Gold: It swings its big tail around during battle. If its foe flinches, it will charge with its sturdy body.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Its tail is thick and powerful. If it binds an enemy, it can snap the victim’s spine quite easily.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It uses its thick arms, legs and tail to attack forcefully. Melee combat is its specialty.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: NIDOKING’s thick tail packs enormously destructive power. With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this POKéMON goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It is recognized by its rock-hard hide and its extended horn. Be careful with the horn as it contains venom.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey’s bones.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A NIDOKING’s thick tail packs enormously destructive power capable of toppling a metal transmission tower. Once it goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It swings its big tail around during battle. If its foe flinches, it will charge with its sturdy body.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Its tail is thick and powerful. If it binds an enemy, it can render the victim helpless quite easily.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.
pokedex_entries.X: It is recognized by its rock-hard hide and its extended horn. Be careful with the horn, as it contains venom.
pokedex_entries.Y: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Nidoking’s thick tail packs enormously destructive power. With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this Pokémon goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle. Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.
pokedex_entries.Sword: When it goes on a rampage, it’s impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it’s lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Nidoking prides itself on its strength. It’s forceful and spirited in battle, making use of its thick tail and diamond-crushing horn.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

desc: Nidorino is a Poison type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Poison Pin Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Its horns contain venom. If they are stabbed into an enemy, the impact makes the poison leak out.
pokedex_entries.Gold: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Quick to anger, it stabs enemies with its horn to inject a powerful poison when it becomes agitated.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It is easily agitated and uses its horn for offense as soon as it notices an attacker.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: NIDORINO has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It is easily angered. By swinging its well-developed horn wildly, it can even punch through diamond.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its horn is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes poison upon impact.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Quick to anger, it stabs enemies with its horn to inject a powerful poison when it becomes agitated.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes poison upon impact.
pokedex_entries.X: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.
pokedex_entries.Y: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Its horn contains venom. If it stabs an enemy with the horn, the impact makes the poison leak out.
pokedex_entries.Sword: With a horn that’s harder than diamond, this Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It’s nervous and quick to act aggressively. The potency of its poison increases along with the level of adrenaline present in its body.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes venom upon impact.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.
pokedex_entries.Gold: It is small, but its horn is filled with poison. It charges then stabs with the horn to inject poison.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. It will strike first if it senses any danger.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It constantly moves its large ears in many directions in order to detect danger right away.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: The male NIDORAN has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanks to them, the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this POKéMON’s notice.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Its large ears are flapped like wings when it is listening to distant sounds. It extends toxic barbs when angered.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: It stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: The male NIDORAN has developed muscles that freely move its ears in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this POKéMON’s notice.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It is small, but its horn is filled with poison. It charges then stabs with the horn to inject poison.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. It will strike first if it senses any danger.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
pokedex_entries.X: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
pokedex_entries.Y: Its large ears are flapped like wings when it is listening to distant sounds. It extends toxic barbs when angered.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Nidoran♂ has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanks to them, the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this Pokémon’s notice.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.
pokedex_entries.Sword: The horn on a male Nidoran’s forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokémon, always straining its large ears.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Small but brave, this Pokémon will hold its ground and even risk its life in battle to protect the female it’s friendly with.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Tough scales cover the sturdy body of this POKéMON. It appears that the scales grow in cycles.
pokedex_entries.Gold: Its body is covered with needle-like scales. It never shows signs of shrinking from any attack.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: The hard scales that cover its strong body serve as excellent protection from any attack.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: NIDOQUEEN’s body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This POKéMON is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: The body is covered by stiff, needle-like scales. If it becomes excited, the needles bristle outwards.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles using its tough, scaly body. This POKéMON is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: Its entire body is armored with hard scales. It will protect the young in its burrow with its life.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: Its body is covered with needle-like scales. It never shows signs of shrinking from any attack.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Its entire body is armored with hard scales. It will protect the young in its burrow with its life.
pokedex_entries.X: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.
pokedex_entries.Y: The body is covered by stiff, needlelike scales. If it becomes excited, the needles bristle outwards.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Nidoqueen’s body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This Pokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Tough scales cover the sturdy body of this Pokémon. It appears that the scales grow in cycles.
pokedex_entries.Sword: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps between the spines on its back. The spines will never secrete poison while young are present.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Its entire body is armored with hard scales. It will protect the young in its burrow with its life.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: The female’s horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: When resting deep in its burrow, its thorns always retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.
pokedex_entries.Gold: When feeding its young, it first chews and tenderizes the food, then spits it out for the offspring.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It has a calm and caring nature. Because its horn grows slowly, it prefers not to fight.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It has a docile nature. If it is threatened with attack, it raises the barbs that are all over its body.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: When NIDORINA are with their friends or family, they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This POKéMON appears to become nervous if separated from the others.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: The female has a gentle temperament. It emits ultrasonic cries that have the power to befuddle foes.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: The female’s horns develop slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: When it is with its friends or family, its barbs are tucked away to prevent injury. It appears to become nervous if separated from the others.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: When it senses danger, it raises all the barbs on its body. These barbs grow slower than NIDORINO’s.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: When feeding its young, it first chews the food into a paste, then spits it out for the offspring.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It has a calm and caring nature. Because its horn grows slowly, it prefers not to fight.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: When it senses danger, it raises all the barbs on its body. These barbs grow slower than Nidorino’s.
pokedex_entries.X: The female has a gentle temperament. It emits ultrasonic cries that have the power to befuddle foes.
pokedex_entries.Y: When feeding its young, it first chews the food into a paste, then spits it out for the offspring.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: When Nidorina are with their friends or family, they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This Pokémon appears to become nervous if separated from the others.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: When resting deep in its burrow, its barbs always retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.
pokedex_entries.Sword: The horn on its head has atrophied. It’s thought that this happens so Nidorina’s children won’t get poked while their mother is feeding them.
pokedex_entries.Shield: If the group is threatened, these Pokémon will band together to assault enemies with a chorus of ultrasonic waves.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: When it senses danger, it raises all the barbs on its body. These barbs grow more slowly than Nidorino’s.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: A mild-mannered POKéMON that does not like to fight. Beware, its small horns secrete venom.
pokedex_entries.Gold: The poison hidden in its small horn is extremely potent. Even a tiny scratch can have fatal results.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Although not very combative, it will torment its foes with poison spikes if it is threatened in any way.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: Small and very docile, it protects itself with its small, poisonous horn when attacked.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: NIDORAN has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied POKéMON. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Though small, it must be treated with caution because of its powerfully toxic barbs. The female has smaller horns.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its highly toxic barbs are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied POKéMON. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: While it does not prefer to fight, even one drop of the poison it secretes from barbs can be fatal.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: The poison hidden in its small horn is extremely potent. Even a tiny scratch can have fatal results.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Although not very combative, it will torment its foes with poison spikes if it is threatened in any way.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: While it does not prefer to fight, even one drop of the poison it secretes from barbs can be fatal.
pokedex_entries.X: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
pokedex_entries.Y: Small and very docile, it protects itself with its small, poisonous horn when attacked.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Nidoran♀ has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied Pokémon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: A mild-mannered Pokémon that does not like to fight. Beware—its small horn secretes venom.
pokedex_entries.Sword: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, they’ll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It uses its hard incisor teeth to crush and eat berries. The tip of a female Nidoran’s horn is a bit more rounded than the tip of a male’s horn.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: While this Pokémon does not prefer to fight, even one drop of the venom it secretes from its barbs can be fatal.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
pokedex_entries.Gold: Transfixing prey with the face-like pattern on its belly, it binds and poisons the frightened victim.
pokedex_entries.Silver: With a very vengeful nature, it won’t give up the chase, no matter how far, once it targets its prey.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: This POKéMON is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once ARBOK wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: This POKéMON has a terrifically strong constricting power. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once it wraps its body around its foe, escaping is impossible.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: Transfixing prey with the face-like pattern on its belly, it binds and poisons the frightened victim.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: With a very vengeful nature, it won’t give up the chase, no matter how far, once it targets its prey.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.
pokedex_entries.X: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.
pokedex_entries.Y: To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: This Pokémon is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once Arbok wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: The latest research has determined that there are over 20 possible arrangements of the patterns on its stomach.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: After stunning its opponents with the pattern on its stomach, it quickly wraps them up in its body and waits for them to stop moving.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.

name: Ekans
desc: Ekans is a Poison type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Snake Pokémon.

name_origin.snake: a species of reptile; ‘ekans’ spelled backwards is ‘snake’

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
pokedex_entries.Gold: It can freely detach its jaw to swallow large prey whole. It can become too heavy to move, however.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It always hides in grass. When first born, it has no poison, so its bite is painful, but harmless.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It flutters the tip of its tongue to seek out the scent of prey, then swallows the prey whole.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: EKANS curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare from its upraised head.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: A very common sight in grassland, etc. It flicks its tongue in and out to sense danger in its surroundings.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Moving silently and stealthily, it eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: An EKANS curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. This position allows it to quickly respond to an enemy from any direction with a threat from its upraised head.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It can freely detach its jaw to swallow large prey whole. It can become too heavy to move, however.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It always hides in grass. When first born, it has no poison, so its bite is painful, but harmless.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.
pokedex_entries.X: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
pokedex_entries.Y: Moving silently and stealthily, it eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare from its upraised head.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: The eggs of bird Pokémon are its favorite food. It swallows eggs whole, so sometimes an egg gets stuck, and Ekans faints.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.

name: Fearow
desc: Fearow is a Normal/Flying type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Beak Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 022 (Red/Blue/Yellow)014 (Gold/Silver/Crystal)022 (FireRed/LeafGreen)014 (HeartGold/SoulSilver)110 (X/Y — Mountain Kalos)074 (Sun/Moon — Alola dex)088 (U.Sun/U.Moon — Alola dex)022 (Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee)

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: A POKéMON that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
pokedex_entries.Gold: It shoots itself suddenly high into the sky, then plummets down in one fell swoop to strike its prey.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It cleverly uses its thin, long beak to pluck and eat small insects that hide under the ground.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It uses its long beak to attack. It has a surprisingly long reach, so it must be treated with caution.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: FEAROW is recognized by its long neck and elongated beak. They are conveniently shaped for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves its long and skinny beak to pluck prey.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Its huge and magnificent wings can keep it aloft in the sky. It can remain flying a whole day without landing.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its long neck and elongated beak are ideal for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves this extended and skinny beak to pluck prey.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPlatinum: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
pokedex_entries.Pearl: It has the stamina to keep flying all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It shoots itself suddenly high into the sky, then plummets down in one fell swoop to strike its prey.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It cleverly uses its thin, long beak to pluck and eat small insects that hide under the ground.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
pokedex_entries.X: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
pokedex_entries.Y: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Fearow is recognized by its long neck and elongated beak. They are conveniently shaped for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves its long and skinny beak to pluck prey.
pokedex_entries.Sun: It’s tough and has excellent stamina. It has no problem flying continuously for a whole day carrying a heavy load.
pokedex_entries.Moon: Drawings of a Pokémon resembling Fearow can be seen in murals from deep in ancient history.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Carrying food through Fearow’s territory is dangerous. It will snatch the food away from you in a flash!
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: In Alola, fish Pokémon are its prey. It can be seen circling above the ocean searching for food.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.
pokedex_entries.Gold: It flaps its short wings to flush out insects from tall grass. It then plucks them with its stubby beak.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: To protect its territory, it flies around ceaselessly, making high-pitched cries.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: SPEAROW has a very loud cry that can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It busily flits around here and there. Even if it is frail, it can be a tough foe that uses MIRROR MOVE.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its loud cry can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It flaps its short wings to flush out insects from tall grass. It then plucks them with its stubby beak.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.
pokedex_entries.X: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.
pokedex_entries.Y: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Spearow has a very loud cry that can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
pokedex_entries.Sun: Its short wings make it inept at flying. It moves about hurriedly and pecks at Bug-type Pokémon in the tall grass.
pokedex_entries.Moon: Farmers whose fields are troubled by bug Pokémon appreciate Spearow for its vigorous appetite and look after it.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Its reckless nature leads it to stand up to others—even large Pokémon—if it has to protect its territory.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Due to its short wings, it can’t fly long distances. It wanders about restlessly and pecks at bug Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: This POKéMON is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.
pokedex_entries.Gold: It has outstanding vision. However high it flies, it is able to distinguish the movements of its prey.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It immobilizes its prey using well-developed claws, then carries the prey more than 60 miles to its nest.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It slowly flies in a circular pattern, all the while keeping a sharp lookout for prey.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: PIDGEOTTO claims a large area as its own territory. This POKéMON flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an EXEGGCUTE to its nest over 60 miles away.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: This POKéMON flies around, patrolling its large territory. If its living space is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It has outstanding vision. However high it flies, it is able to distinguish the movements of its prey.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It renders its prey immobile using well-developed claws, then carries the prey more than 60 miles to its nest.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.
pokedex_entries.X: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute to its nest over 60 miles away.
pokedex_entries.Y: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Pidgeotto claims a large area as its own territory. This Pokémon flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.
pokedex_entries.Gold: It usually hides in tall grass. Because it dislikes fighting, it protects itself by kicking up sand.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Common in grassy areas and forests, it is very docile and will chase off enemies by flapping up sand.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It rapidly flaps its wings in the grass, stirring up a dust cloud that drives insect prey out into the open.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: PIDGEY has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Does not like to fight. It hides in tall grass and so on, foraging for food such as small bugs.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It can unerringly return home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It usually hides in tall grass. Because it dislikes fighting, it protects itself by kicking up sand.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Common in grassy areas and forests, it is very docile and will chase off enemies by flapping up sand.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.

pokedex_entries.Y: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Pidgey has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.
pokedex_entries.Gold: Although it is a cocoon, it can move a little. It can extend its poison barb if it is attacked.
pokedex_entries.Silver: From this form, it will grow into an adult. As its body becomes softer, the external shell hardens.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: Nearly incapable of movement, it leans against stout trees while waiting for its evolution.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: KAKUNA remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: This POKéMON is in a temporary stage while making its body. It is almost completely unable to move on its own.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It remains virtually immobile while it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it busily prepares for evolution. This is evident from how hot its shell becomes.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: Although it is a cocoon, it can move a little. It can extend its poison barb if it is attacked.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.
pokedex_entries.Gold: Its poison stinger is very powerful. Its bright-colored body is intended to warn off its enemies.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It attacks using a two-inch poison barb on its head. It can usually be found under the leaves it eats.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: The barb on top of its head secretes a strong poison. It uses this toxic barb to protect itself.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: WEEDLE has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp stinger on its head that injects poison.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: A WEEDLE has an extremely acute sense of smell. It distinguishes its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It eats its weight in leaves every day. It fends off attackers with the needle on its head.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: Its poison stinger is very powerful. Its bright-colored body is intended to warn off its enemies.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It attacks using a two-inch poison barb on its head. It can usually be found under the leaves it eats.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Its wings, covered with poisonous powders, repel water. This allows it to fly in the rain.
pokedex_entries.Gold: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Water-repellent powder on its wings enables it to collect honey, even in the heaviest of rains.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It flits from flower to flower, collecting honey. It can even identify distant flowers in bloom.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: BUTTERFREE has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can even search out, extract, and carry honey from flowers that are blooming over six miles from its nest.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: The wings are protected by rain-repellent dust. As a result, this POKéMON can fly about even in rain.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: It has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can seek, extract, and carry honey from flowers blooming over six miles away.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Water-repellent powder on its wings enables it to collect honey, even in the heaviest of rains.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.
pokedex_entries.X: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.
pokedex_entries.Y: The wings are protected by rain-repellent dust. As a result, this Pokémon can fly about even in rain.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Butterfree has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can even search out, extract, and carry honey from flowers that are blooming over six miles from its nest.
pokedex_entries.Sun: Close examination of its large eyes reveals that each eye is composed of a myriad of tiny eyes.
pokedex_entries.Moon: When attacked by other Pokémon, it defends itself by scattering its poisonous scales and fluttering its wings.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Its wings are covered in toxic scales. If it finds bird Pokémon going after Caterpie, Butterfree sprinkles its scales on them to drive them off.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Nectar from pretty flowers is its favorite food. In fields of flowers, it has heated battles with Cutiefly for territory.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Its wings, covered with poisonous powder, repel water. This allows it to fly in the rain.
pokedex_entries.Sword: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It loves the nectar of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.

location.Sword: Crystallized Gigantamax energy makes up this Pokémon’s blindingly bright and highly toxic scales.
location.Shield: Once it has opponents trapped in a tornado that could blow away a 10-ton truck, it finishes them off with its poisonous scales.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Hardens its shell to protect itself. However, a large impact may cause it to pop out of its shell.
pokedex_entries.Gold: Inside the shell, it is soft and weak as it prepares to evolve. It stays motionless in the shell.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It prepares for evolution by hardening its shell as much as possible to protect its soft body.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: This is its pre-evolved form. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: The shell covering this POKéMON’s body is as hard as an iron slab. METAPOD does not move very much. It stays still because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the hard shell.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a harsh attack.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its shell is as hard as an iron slab. A METAPOD does not move very much because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the shell.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: Inside the shell, it is soft and weak as it prepares to evolve. It stays motionless in the shell.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It prepares for evolution by hardening its shell as much as possible to protect its soft body.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.
pokedex_entries.X: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.
pokedex_entries.Y: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: The shell covering this Pokémon’s body is as hard as an iron slab. Metapod does not move very much. It stays still because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the hard shell.
pokedex_entries.Sun: Its shell is filled with its soft innards. It doesn’t move much because of the risk it might carelessly spill its innards out.
pokedex_entries.Moon: Its shell is hard, but it’s still just a bug shell. It’s been known to break, so intense battles with it should be avoided.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Its shell is filled with a thick liquid. All of the cells throughout its body are being rebuilt in preparation for evolution.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Its hard shell doesn’t crack a bit even if Pikipek pecks at it, but it will tip over, spilling out its insides.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: Hardens its shell to protect itself. However, a large impact may cause it to pop out of its shell.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a harsh attack.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. The Pokémon quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: If you touch the feeler on top of its head, it will release a horrible stink to protect itself.
pokedex_entries.Gold: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It crawls into foliage where it camouflages itself among leaves that are the same color as its body.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: CATERPIE has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this POKéMON releases a terrifically strong odor.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It is covered with a green skin. When it grows, it sheds the skin, covers itself with silk, and becomes a cocoon.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its voracious appetite compels it to devour leaves bigger than itself without hesitation. It releases a terribly strong odor from its antennae.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
pokedex_entries.X: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedex_entries.Y: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Caterpie has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this Pokémon releases a terrifically strong odor.
pokedex_entries.Sun: When attacked by bird Pokémon, it resists by releasing a terrifically strong odor from its antennae, but it often becomes their prey.
pokedex_entries.Moon: It’s easy to catch, and it grows quickly, making it one of the top recommendations for novice Pokémon Trainers.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Perhaps because it would like to grow up quickly, it has a voracious appetite, eating a hundred leaves a day.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Its body is soft and weak. In nature, its perpetual fate is to be seen by others as food.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: If you touch the feeler on top of its head, it will release a horrible stink to protect itself.
pokedex_entries.Sword: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It releases a stench from its red antennae to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: When tapped, this POKéMON will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.
pokedex_entries.Gold: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that WARTORTLE is very old.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: Its long, furry tail is a symbol of longevity, making it quite popular among older people.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as WARTORTLE ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this POKéMON’s toughness as a battler.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: This POKéMON is very popular as a pet. Its fur-covered tail is a symbol of its longevity.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: It often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For fast swimming, it moves its ears to maintain balance.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its large tail is covered with rich, thick fur that deepens in color with age. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this POKéMON’s toughness in battle.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: It is a well-established symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that WARTORTLE is very old.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.

pokedex_entries.Y: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as Wartortle ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon’s toughness as a battler.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: When tapped on its head, this Pokémon will pull it in, but its tail will stick out a little bit.
pokedex_entries.Sword: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.
pokedex_entries.Shield: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.
pokedex_entries.Gold: The shell is soft when it is born. It soon becomes so resilient, prodding fingers will bounce off it.
pokedex_entries.Silver: The shell, which hardens soon after it is born, is resilient. If you poke it, it will bounce back out.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: When it feels threatened, it draws its legs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: SQUIRTLE’s shell is not merely used for protection. The shell’s rounded shape and the grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water, enabling this POKéMON to swim at high speeds.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its shell is not just for protection. Its rounded shape and the grooves on its surface minimize resistance in water, enabling SQUIRTLE to swim at high speeds.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.

pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: The shell, which hardens soon after it is born, is resilient. If you poke it, it will bounce back out.

pokedex_entries.Sword: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.
pokedex_entries.Shield: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: Tough fights could excite this POKéMON. When excited, it may blow out bluish-white flames.
pokedex_entries.Gold: It is very hotheaded by nature, so it constantly seeks opponents. It calms down only when it wins.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphire: CHARMELEON mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe. It then tears up the fallen opponent with sharp claws.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to unbearably high levels.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes. If it encounters a strong enemy, it becomes agitated, and the flame on its tail flares with a bluish white color.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: In the rocky mountains where CHARMELEON live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
